name: Fossilpunk
description: Lead space dino settlers to rebuild your civilization and rise again! Start cities, expand borders, grow your economy, and master tactical battles. Unleash epic dino combos in this turn-based strategy game with 4X and Roguelite elements. Rawr!

name: Arsenic & Absinthe
description: Arsenic & Absinthe is a blend of a chill bartender simulation with narrative-driven story. The player takes on the role of "Sylene", a bartender who recently began a new life; making drinks, serving unusual recipes of art, and listening to the stories of working-class customers. A simple life, however, is merely a dream for her as her haunted past returns. The player has to explore the night city and solve the pre-midlife crisis while getting caught in the notorious "Snow White" murder case once more.

name: Powerup
description: Connect metal blocks to transfer energy between transformers.

name: Cosmic Cannon
description: Keep a ball in the air as long as possible by firing more balls into it.

name: Super Pocket: Atari Edition
description: The Super Pocket Atari Edition is a handheld gaming console that brings the golden era of video gaming right to your pocket. With 50 classic games from the legendary company, including, Asteroids, Missile Command, Berzerk, Crystal Castles along with games from the 2600, 5200, 7800 and the Atari Lynx!

name: Bearricade
description: Bearricade is a 32-map Vanilla Limit-removing megawad for Doom 2. It is a megawad of speedmaps and maps (or fragments) that were previously scrapped or abandoned by Death Bear.

name: The Lost Tetekoa
description: The Lost Tetekoa is set in the world of Ärta, a fictional world with Industrial fantasy elements, like magic with firearms. The map is somewhat a spiritual successor to Angmngthoo, one of fai1025 previous maps that goes with the same visual style of Eco-Brutalism.

name: Ozonia 2
description: Ozonia 2 is the sequel to the former 2022 wad Ozonia. The megawad follows a similar philosophy from the first Ozonia by containing fairly short maps with plutonish rocket-based gameplay, non-linear navigation and cryptic lore-based narrative.

name: Pokémon Puffy Pink
description: A Pokémon Fire Red ROM hack that replaces all 151 Pokémon with Kirby characters, complete with movesets, abilities, stat spreads, etc.

name: Cabbie!
description: Cabbie! is an epic co-op driving adventure for one to four players. Boost, drift and jump your way around town to deliver people and packages in a race against the clock. Unlock new characters, levels and cosmetics as you journey across worlds!

name: Hangman
description: A strange game of hangman with a strange man. Traverse through the darkness, letters, & watchful eyes to save your friend. Decode notes left behind to uncover the message that you never got, but should have had.

name: BattleHeights
description:
BattleHeights is a multiplayer party game combining elements of aerial combat, fantasy, and physics-based mechanics.

Players engage in matches across floating maps, using abilities like double jumps, grappling hooks, and wind spells to outmaneuver and outwit their opponents. The gameplay revolves around creative movement, strategic use of terrain, and team-based objectives in modes like King of the Hill, Team Deathmatch and other fun activities, like a Grappling Race.

The game features cartoony physics, emphasizing fun and laughter over competitive intensity.

name: Lilith's Lair
description: A story driven sextroidvania click-em-up where you play as a brave barbarian ascending a lascivious lair!

name: DCA3
description: An unofficial reverse-engineering project that brings Grand Theft Auto III to the Dreamcast.

name: World of Magicka Bundle
description: Paradox Interactive introduces a special “World of Magicka” bundle for the Magicka 5-year anniversary celebration. This Bundle which includes both Magicka and Magicka 2, all DLC and expansions for Magicka and for Magicka 2.

name: Government Contractors: Arms of Influence
description: Historically accurate strategy game where you act as a government contractor researching, developing, and manufacturing weapons and technology for your clients. You choose the parts for each product, but be aware that cheap or wrong political choices may affect your success rate!

name: Gemerald
description: Ongezellig themed mod for Half-Life.

name: Pokemon Supreme Fire
description: Sin descripción

name: Learning Ladder: Year 3
description: Learning Ladder: Year 3 is an educational PC game designed for ages 7 to 8. The game aims to teach kids about maths, reading and writing.

name: Gaia Aura
description: Originally made for the "Vanity" community project but has now been released as a standalone map by Ar_e_en.

name: Brisk
description: Brisk is a set of 30 maps in MBF21 format where each map was created in 24 hours by various authors.

name: Zephyr
description: Zephyr is a made by Scotty in 1 week for their 2024 wiki and with some Speed of Doom influence.

name: Pokemon Fused Dimensions
description: Pokemon Fused Dimensions is a GBA ROM Hack by DanteZ.35 based on Pokemon Fire Red. And it is now available to download. It was last updated on September 24, 2022.

name: Road Rash 2
description: An unreleased Game Gear port of Road Rash II.

name: Man Boy vs. Doctor Sock
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Rush
description: DEAD RUSH - This is a dynamic first-person shooter in which you must confront hordes of hungry zombies! There's no convoluted plot, side quests and a large open world. Here you will find only concentrated action. The only thing you will be doing in this game is shooting at the crowd of reanimated dead. Explore the location, find the most powerful gun and destroy ten waves of zombies before they reach you!

name: Little Corner Tea House
description: Little Corner Tea House is a casual simulation game where you can make favorite drinks and talk with different customers to relax.

name: Heinz Honor and Revenge
description: Heinz Honor & Revenge is a beat 'em up game that offers an action-packed experience with a deep story and challenging puzzles. Players will take on the role of Heinz, a secret agent fighting for his country against various threats from ruthless criminal syndicates.

name: Leo & Mia: Animal Rescue
description: Become a valiant animal rescuer as either Leo or Mia! Save wildlife in the savannah from poachers and other dangers in over 15 exciting missions!

name: 100-in-1 Game Collection
description: Meet Magrat the witch, Harvey the weird fish, Stephanie the green cow and all their beloved friends, and embark on an epic journey through 100 arcade games that blend classic gameplay from your favorite retro titles with new concepts that are reinventing the arcade genre! Score as much as you can, then improve and challenge yourself to get all stars in solo or with your friends!

name: Do Dishes As Spencer
description: This is how spencer does dishes because he is over 6ft.

name: Due
description:
Due is a short first person horror, climbing / walking simulator.

In the far future, take control of someone tasked with appeasing the Gods to regain their tribe's life source - water.

Made for the 48 hour Haunted PS1 Wretched Weekend Jam.

A spiritual predecessor to Kill the KOTH

name: The Egg
description:
A short atmospheric game about the meaning of life.

This is an adaptation of Andy Weir's short story, with permission of the author. It tries to be as close to the original material as possible, while offering an immersive interactive experience, with minimal 3D visuals and a dynamic ambient soundtrack.

name: Storm the Swan
description: Make Cute Animal Friends in this 8-bit Gameboy-inspired adventure! But there's something lurking in the woods, with DARK SECRETS you'll need to uncover!

name: Booze & Ooze
description: In this deckbuilder and tavern management simulation featuring RPG and roguelite elements, you play a destitute leprechaun trying to claw his way back to fortune and power from behind the counter of a derelict inn. You are no hero material, but unfortunately for you, your clients are!

name: The Hunter's Path
description: Survive. Hunt. Thrive. In "The Hunter's Path," immerse yourself in a top-down survival hunting game. Navigate through the terrain, stalk your prey, and craft your needed supplies.

name: A Butterfly
description:
Part horror part interactive poem about overcoming, and bittersweet surrender.
A Butterfly is part of a larger project, BlueSuburbia, but was released as a standalone because it's very big.

name: Covermount
description: One of our programmers said that they wanted to express their opinion on the quality of our offices via this game. We don't understand.

name: Covemachine
description: We're still returning back to normal after Covermount, we didn't finish the installation on these Covemonties. Help

name: Loop
description: Loop is a visual novel set in a dark Irish Forest. Deirdre is set to find her husband who was sworn to become the Forest King. But it’s not easy for a human to walk in the magical realm. What will Deirdre learn about this other world? What will she find out about herself?

name: Dipets
description: Dipets is a casual RPG where you have to explore and help rebuild the city of a weird world while taking care of a virtual pet.

name: MyPopgoes: New and Improved!
description: myPopgoes has been reprogrammed from scratch, with countless fixes, optimisations, and brand new features! New and Improved! is out NOW as a free update to the game on Steam.

name: Lingo met Lucille Werner
description: Lingo met Lucille Werner is a Nintendo DS game based on the Dutch game show Lingo.

name: Lingo voor Kinderen
description: Lingo voor Kinderen is a Nintendo DS game based on the Dutch game show Lingo.

name: Lingo Deluxe
description: Lingo Deluxe is a Nintendo DS game based on the Dutch game show Lingo.

name: Hero of the Kingdom: The Lost Tales 3
description:
Experience an adventure full of surprises and save the kingdom from the evil wizard.

The pursuit of the evil wizard Fendrel has led you to an unknown kingdom. The local people live their peaceful lives here, unaware that the evil wizard has returned to their land and is plotting his terrible revenge. A darkness is coming that will engulf the whole kingdom. You can’t let that happen. You must seek out the forces of good and stop the evil wizard. You can count on fortune to favor those who are brave. An adventure full of surprises and heroic deeds awaits you.

Explore the kingdom and stop the evil wizard’s terrible revenge.
Help people and complete many interesting quests.
Fight monsters and learn many skills.
Find hundreds of useful hidden items.
Earn up to 26 achievements.

Play through the third and final episode of the Lost Tales storyline, which takes you right before the events of the original Hero of the Kingdom game. Enjoy a casual and lovely adventuring RPG that features classic story-driven Point&Click exploration in an old-school isometric style. Embark on a journey to explore a beautiful country, help people and complete many interesting quests. Learn skills, trade and collect items in your inventory. Earn nice rewards for your good deeds and achievements. Get ready for a new heroic adventure to stop the evil wizard’s terrible revenge.

name: Starmount
description: We're getting close to the end of Monty's contract so we thought we'd launch them into space. It Just Makes Sense

name: Trainwreck
description: Trainwreck is a nonlinear visual novel where your choices will have a significant impact on the story. Navigate it wisely, as their lives are in your hands.

name: Stormbridge
description: Build a bridge settlement while outrunning an impending storm in this roguelite city builder. Unlock upgrades and pets between runs as you unravel the storm's origin. Can you survive and build the longest self-sufficient bridge?

name: The Violets of Amicus
description: Attack, dodge, and counter the monsters invading the land of Velare in The Violets of Amicus, a 2D action-adventure inspired by classic dungeon crawlers and modern combat games alike. The ferocious Violets are waking from their ancient gardens. Can a lowly courier save the kingdom?

name: Grave Deceiver
description: Grave Deceiver is a rogue-like where a corpse swaps places with you in the grave, casting you into hell while it takes your place in the world of the living. Now, you must fight to escape and return home.

name: The Cleaning Game
description: As a cleaning machine, tend to the custodial duties of an office while trying to avoid human scrutiny and existential dread. Listen to the computers around you, while there is still time. If you are brave enough, investigate your origin and inherent meaning as an electronic in a human world.

name: PC Mus
description: The game is a simulator of mus, a card game of Spanish origin with more than two hundred years of history that is widely played in countries such as Spain, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Mexico and in certain regions of southern France. Although the game may seem a bit cheap due to its graphics, the truth is that the player can play a game of mus with each and every one of its moves and rules: bets, bluffs, signals, etc.

name: Droplets
description: Send the droplets spiralling into high score zones to unlock further challenges.

name: Journey to die
description:
This is a Japanese visual novel produced by MUGnet.
And this is their first work.

name: Tempest Tower
description: Protect your tower from invading Creepers using wild contraptions, powerful upgrades, or maybe just... jump on their heads! Tempest Tower reinvents Tower Defense with a thrilling mix of strategic base-building and engaging player-driven combat! Can you withstand the onslaught and save Trip Space?

name: Limoria
description: Welcome to a world where you are lost between consciousness and dreams. As you wander the dark corridors of an old hotel, face the games your mind plays on you. Your memories linger like a shadow following you. But there's nowhere to escape... Are you ready to confront your darkest fears?

name: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective
description: 2024: Mosaic Retrospective is a charity-fundraising picross/minesweeper hybrid featuring a single ENORMOUS puzzle inspired by global news stories from throughout the year.

name: Gar-Type
description:
GORESTAR, the living planet, is on a direct course for Earth.
It's time to debut our secret weapon duo:
Ace pilot Jon Starbuckle, and his prototype starfighter, Gar-Type D.
Your mission: save humanity! Defend the Earth from the alien invaders!

name: Welcome Home
description: Sin descripción

name: Project TurboBlast
description: Drift, boost, and spin around corners at BLASTING SPEEDS in this stylish Singleplayer + Multiplayer Arcade Racing game, Blending the familiar drifting of Kart racers and tight responsive handling of classic Anti-Gravity racing games. With a focus on being easy to pick up but difficult to master.

name: Signal Lost
description: You play as Alex, a technician dispatched for an emergency night repair at a remote radio tower deep in the woods. What starts as a simple task quickly descends into a nerve-wracking nightmare when the signal you’re fixing begins broadcasting something... unnatural.

name: Escalation Titan
description: A Canadian U.A.C. base, CFB Titan, is being overrun by demonic forces and you must escape to the transporter on the other side of the large complex.

name: 2017 Collection
description: 2017 Collection is a six-level PWAD for Doom II designed for Boom-compatible source ports, created by James Collins (an_mutt). MAP05 was made in collaboration with Brayden Hart (AD_79). Four of the five levels in the WAD were previously released by an_mutt as part of the Scrapper collection

name: World of Slavic Glasses
description: World of Slavic Glasses – a bullet-hell action game set in the world of Slavic folklore. You will fly on a stupa, fight hordes of undead creatures, and shop at Baba Yaga's store, which can surprise you as you upgrade it! Build your perfect character and try to survive all 20 waves!

name: Truck Kyousoukyoku: Ai to Kanashimi no Rodeo
description: The PS2 port of this game betters the original with new tracks and additional graphical details. As the truck maneuvering maniac, your goal is to race against competing truckers any which way but loose. Drive on sidewalks, search for shortcuts, discover secret roads and plunge headlong into traffic with no reservation. You are, after all, a maniac. Upon winning races, the player gets a can of aerosol to paint designs and emblems on the body of the truck. The sides, top, back, and head of the vehicle are open canvases for you to drop paint and swirl a menacing symbol or a nature panorama. Preset designs may be chosen or you can create your own doodles which help you help your truck emote. The action is hot and the paint jobs add to the ambience.

name: Murder Malady
description: The 20th game in the Carol Reed series. A point and click detective story made by real photographs.

name: Bridge to Another World: Escape From Oz
description:
From 4Friends, creators of Living Legends, comes an exciting new game in the Bridge to Another World series!

Today started out like any other day – you sent your kids off to school and settled in for some peace and quiet with your little dog, Toto. But your world is turned upside-down when a tornado suddenly appears and carries your house to the extraordinary land of Oz. Now you find yourself in the middle of a fierce competition controlled by the mysterious Great Wizard. To earn your way back home, you and Toto must explore the four corners of Oz, facing enemies, obstacles, and puzzles at every turn! Are you up to the challenge? Find out in this Hidden Object Puzzle Adventure game!

name: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room
description: Locked in my Darkness 2: The Room is a psychological horror game set from the perspective of a Japanese high school student in a New York apartment complex.

name: Coloring Pixels: Microscopic Pack
description:
This Microscopic book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! Images are things under the microscope!

Put on your lab coat and discover what things look like up close!

name: Dodd Goes To The Museum
description: Explore Dodd's local museum in this short, casual and relaxing adventure! Visit various exhibits within the museum's four wings and talk to various characters along the way!

name: The Memories That Shape Us
description: The Memories That Shape Us is a first-person, walking-simulator, narrative video game. Find the Memory Capsules to uncover the story of a person’s life from childhood to adulthood, all the joys, all the struggles, and all the lessons.

name: Bulletfest
description: Sin descripción

name: In This House
description: In This House is a horror-adventure video game for Nintendo Game Boy, Analogue Pocket and PC. It uses timeless four-color 8-bit graphics to tell a universal story about the struggle for one's identity within a family.

name: Slivania
description: Slivania is a short-form 3D platforming metroidvania, made in under a week for the 32-Bit Winter 2024 Jam!

name: Minesweeper But the First Tile is Always a Mine
description: Minesweeper but the first tile is always a mine.

name: Lost
description: You are lost in the backrooms, find your way out.

name: Termite Man
description: Termite Man is an metroidvania style platformer. Almost every asset is made by hand with love.

name: Outter Carrier
description: A short and weird RPG Maker game about delivering an important package in an inhabitable crumbling building.

name: Sacred Dark
description:
Enfys always loved horror...
Now it's mutual...

name: Paws & Perils: Out Of This World
description: The world of Terranimalium was a peaceful and diverse world filled with biomes and animals of every kind… No wander the aliens would want to take it- But you and your friends aren’t going to let that happen!

name: Cantaloupe Chronicle
description:
You've arrived in the cozy roadside town of Cantaloupe to begin your internship at your aunt's newspaper. Here, you'll not only learn how to craft compelling articles but also uncover the big mystery hidden in the town's past.

Explore Cantaloupe by collecting items, engaging with locals, and solving puzzles to uncover a series of smaller stories to write about. Keep your eyes peeled for clues related to the big mystery—the key to your final, front-page article.

The game offers a variety of topics for you to explore and write about using a custom text editor. Don't worry, you don't have to write all the text yourself—you'll find clues that unlock text blocks, which you can easily insert into your articles with a simple click. Your ultimate goal is to piece together the story behind a mysterious body found years ago and uncover the truth.

Discover the charming locations in and around Cantaloupe, filled with atmosphere and intriguing characters to meet. Immerse yourself in this laid-back experience and soak in the soothing ambiance of a small, roadside town.

name: TeeDee
description: A minimalist 2D tower defense game with 3 towers, 6 maps, and 4 monster types. Simple, fun, and perfect for quick strategy sessions!

name: Imprisoned
description:
Imprisoned is a Massively Multiplayer Online Role-Playing Game (MMORPG) developed with the Unreal Engine 5 graphics engine and advanced predictive artificial intelligence system.

Your objective is to serve your sentence and survive within a hostile prison as a persistent world. During your time behind bars, you must create a character, level up, improve it, and obtain protections and weapons through missions or by eliminating certain enemies you will encounter during your journey through the prison.

name: Tree of Savior: Neverland
description:
Embark on a Timeless Journey of Love, The Carnival Edition is here!

"Tree of Savior: Neverland" Carnival Edition is Here!

Experience the all-new Tree Bond System by hosting a romantic Tree Ceremony; rally your allies and prepare to face the challenge of the new Demon God Dungeon Boss!
Don't forget to log into the New Adventure Server to claim 120 free draws, an 8-piece gold gear set, and an exclusive 4-piece golden fashion set for free!

Let's Embark on a Timeless Journey of Love!

The dream-filled Tree of Savior now continues with its official masterpiece, "Tree of Savior: Neverland"!

Produced by Kim Hakkyu, with music by Motoi Sakuraba, featuring masterful visuals and soundtracks, it's a heartwarming MMO filled with joy and wonder!

name: Hentai: Nazi Girl
description: HENTAI: NAZI GIRL is a satirical 3rd person shooter where you play as a sexy naked girl. You will have to destroy the enemies, evil and dangerous, also go to their base, where you need to kill everyone (unexpectedly, right?), you need to collect propaganda posters (and they contain jokes with elements of black humor, be sure to read it). After collecting all the propaganda posters, you need to find the hidden invitation to the club. And then a new big enemy will appear and you will be allowed to destroy the eyes lying on the ground, which indicate a connection with the enemy.

name: 2 Games in 1: Finding Nemo + The Incredibles
description: A compilation of Pixar themed games on a single cartridge.

name: Sister Lumina and the Hypnosis Cult
description: When Lumina is forced to open a forbidden book passed down by her grandmother in order to rescue her best friend, she will have to pay a hefty price to gain the power to free her and ensure her safety.

name: Reksio i Kretes: Sermageddon
description: The temple of the Cheesegod has been stolen! The weather is going crazy… Could it be that the enraged Cheesegod is bringing Cheesemageddon down upon the Earth? Who would dare commit such a sacrilege? Pirates? Aliens? One thing is certain — our heroes will be forced to return to the darkest location of all their adventures — Paris.

name: Catcha
description: Catcha is a catching game where you shoot bombs and bosses, not your average catching game...

name: Submerged Mystery: Takodachi
description: Submerged Mystery: Takodachi is a top-down dungeon-crawling RPG featuring the Takodachis by Ninomae Ina'nis from hololive English. Players explore a sprawling labyrinth filled with puzzles, powerful enemies, and secrets tied to the enigmatic Ancient Ones. As you delve deeper, you unlock new abilities and summon skills from past Takodachis to aid in your journey. Elemental Affinities play a crucial role in combat, allowing players to strategize against the unique challenges posed by the Takodachis guarding the labyrinth.

name: Saintess of the Golden Bow
description:
Celine thought her life as an American office worker was mundane, but after a fatal accident, she wakes up as an extra character in her favorite web novel a BL tragedy fantasy. Expected to die early as part of the protagonist's backstory, Celine defies fate and survives her death event, causing a butterfly effect that catapults her into the role of the Saintess of the Golden Bow.

Joined by an unforgettable cast of characters including the valiant knight Levi, the enigmatic Mad Prince Noah, and the devout High Priest Elijah you must lead a quest to defeat the Demon Queen and bring peace to the realm. Each choice you make weaves a complex web of romance, friendship, and sacrifice, offering a deeply personal and replayable journey.

name: Frosted Love
description: A short visual novel featuring Dizzy Dokuro, Kaneko Lumi, Hoshiumi Jelly and Ember Amane from the VTuber agency Phase-Connect.

name: The Big Gay Adventure
description: The Big Gay Adventure is a bright and silly, JRPG-inspired game that explores identity, community, and free queer expression.

name: Psy-O-Blade
description: In 21th century, there are three main powers on the Earth. The free world and the communist block carried over from the 20th century; the third power is the New Communist Federation. Since a program of denuclearizing was supported by all those powers, the New Communist Federation developed a devastating non-nuclear weapon: the satellite "Raiden". The two other powers competed with the New Communist Federation, developing their own killer satellites, and the danger of total annihilation became once again an issue. Seeing no future for the Earth, humans started to colonize other planets. In 22th century, they sent an experimental ship "Septemius 1" to a star six light years far away from the Solar System. The ship's main computer, "Racoon", sent a strange message before stopping any communication. Keith McDonnell, a seventeen-year-old crew member of the ship "Septemius 2", was sent to investigate the strange disappearance. Psy-O-Blade is a Japanese adventure in anime style. The player interacts with the game world by moving a cursor and clicking on objects to examine or use them, and people to talk to them, or by choosing options ("Move" and "Scroll") from a menu. There are no puzzles to solve; the player advances in the game by talking to characters, visiting different locations, as well as examining and using objects.

name: Megabonk
description: Smash your way through endless waves of enemies and grow absurdly powerful! Grab loot, level up, unlock characters and upgrade to create unique and crazy builds as you fend off hordes of creatures!

name: Beneath a Dead City
description: Run your own Adventurer's Guild in this fantasy colony sim with a focus on dynamic storytelling. Recruit heroes to explore a ruined city, but keep an eye on those murder hobos. An unhappy hero could turn to arson, violence, and jaywalking.

name: Arch Wizard
description: Fast paced "Hyper Shooter" complemented with esoteric exploration experience. Take a quest to become Arch Wizard: dominate surrounding realms, reverse Time, escape Death, befriend Chaos, face the End of the World. Knowledge based progression. High scores. Full of secrets.

name: Shaki Shaki Island
description: A GB-styled drawing game created for Game Off 2024. Use an 8x8 drawing grid to recreate the wildlife and scenery around you.

name: Fentanyl Edition
description: Fentanyl Edition is a Fast-Paced Arena Shooter. With the most surreal visuals you may lay your eyes upon.

name: Jahmong
description:
Jahmong is a Sega Dreamcast online mahjong game developed and published by Visit. Released exclusively in Japan in August 2000,

Voice recognition mahjong game. It's a hot game with a voice recognition system like never before, with increased luck depending on the size of your voice.

Play against strong enemies all over the country at Gourmet Mode. From Hokkaido in the north to Kyushu in the south, around the country, get all the local specialties!!

name: City of Voices
description: A short Golden Idol-like deduction game about a young girl who is catapulted from her suburban life into a mysterious adventure. Investigate a series of moments frozen in time. Examine clues and solve puzzles to uncover a story full of twists and turns.

name: Cole's Christmas 2024: GoonQuest
description: A Christmas gift for Cole.

name: Yuurou: Transient Sands
description: Riku is a knight of the Yuurou empire, part of a medieval fantasy world known as Varcias. One day, returning to Yuurou through the desert, Riku found a girl lying nearly unconscious on the sand. This girl is revealed to be Azusa, a modern-day Japanese schoolgirl who, thanks to a time warp, ended up in Varcias. Riku must now help Azusa return to her home world. But enemy forces are attacking Yuurou, and the Empress is in desperate need of assistance...

name: In the Dark
description: A brain-teasing assembly of puzzles where there is but one goal - turn off all of the lights. Each light when turned on or off will flip the states of the lights adjacent to it.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City 2001
description: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City 2001 is a lore friendly total conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto 3 that attempts to make the game more in line with its counterparts from later in the 3D era by updating gameplay as well as design direction to match that of its successors.

name: Table Game End
description: After school today, I talk with her again. Through the window, I see the sunset and someone playing in the schoolyard. We simply watch the scene or share memories from the past."TABLE GAME END" is an adventure game.

name: Retro Santa Run
description: Ready to slide into the fun?

name: 3D MiniGolf: Makeover-Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Shapeo
description: Sin descripción

name: Sector Beam
description: Sin descripción

name: Drug Trader Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Liar's Pub
description: Sin descripción

name: Let's Compare the Speed of Our Punches!
description: Sin descripción

name: Journey of Johann: Grasslands
description: Sin descripción

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 1 (Holiday Special)
description: Return to the world of To the Moon in this heartfelt spin-off that dives deeper into the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. During a holiday season filled with both festive cheer and public protests against the Sigmund Corporation, this minisode explores the ethical dilemmas and emotional challenges behind their wish-fulfillment work.

name: To the Moon: Sigmund Minisode 2 (Holiday Special)
description: Step into the next chapter of To the Moon with Sigmund Minisode 2, a poignant holiday-themed spin-off that offers a deeper look at the lives of Dr. Eva Rosalene and Dr. Neil Watts. This part continues to explore the personal struggles, mysterious secrets, and ethical dilemmas faced by the doctors of Sigmund Corporation.

name: Steamboat Willie Incident
description: Steamboat Willie Incident is a 3D horror survival game where you are captured in a steamboat and you have to find ways to escape without alerting Willie. Try to find clues, solve puzzles and hide from Willie in a claustrophobic steamboat where you are surrounded only by sea. Will you be able to?

name: Colony
description: A teenage guy is playing cricket with his friends outside a haunted house, and as he strikes a six,the ball travels inside the home.He goes to pick up the ball. During his search, he experienced a horrifying incident with the ghost.

name: Wobbly Construction!
description: Reach the top of the construction site. Carefully place each step, watch out for obstacles on your way up, and try not to quit the game out of frustration.

name: Casino Heist: Aruba
description: *Casino Heist: Aruba* is a comedic heist Visual Novel and dating sim where every choice counts. Assemble a team, craft the perfect plan, and tackle a high-stakes robbery targeting a shady casino. Can you outsmart the odds, secure a fortune, and maybe even find love? The score of a lifetime awaits!

name: Acid Web
description: Defend your web from an onslaught of strange creatures to the beat of a dynamic, generative acid techno soundtrack in this all-nonsense arcade-style twin stick shooter.

name: Net Raiders
description: Net Raiders is a single-player game that combines RPG, deck-building, and roguelike elements. In order to survive the dangers of the ruined virtual world, you must synthesize the cards in your hand to find the best move and defeat the enemies you encounter!

name: Look At Me
description: Look At Me is a first-person horror game where you must escape from a haunted house by solving puzzles and facing terrifying paranormal phenomena.

name: FleshBound
description: FleshBound is a fast paced and blood pumping demon-slaying speed running first person action platformer with a unique “splatterpunk” aesthetic. Fight, jump and sprint your way through the levels using your hookshot and wall-running skills.

name: Diddy
description: Destroy a dark party in Diddy's mansion. Gather your comrades Eminam and 51 Cent and save Justin B from Diddy! You can destroy the party with your friends by experiencing co-op

name: Wanted?
description: It's not often that you look closely at the faces of people you pass on the street, is it? It's no wonder that there are people near you who look exactly like the ones on the wanted list .This game will test your observational skills.

name: REVEREX: DX
description: REVEREX: DX is a 2-player asymmetric experience that blends platforming action and microgames on a visually stunning trip through the mind. Don the roles of Lab Technicians operating an experimental Coma Treatment device, explore the deepest reaches of the subconscious and rescue your patient!

name: Honkai Impact 3rd: In Search of the Sun
description:
Version 8.0 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes
• New Part 2 Story Chapter VII: Bouquets of Unfulfilled Wishes
• New Part 2 Open World: Tower of Ruimu: God
• New S Rank Valkyrie: Reign Solaris (Durandal)
• New Featured Event: Countdown: To Sweet Dreams!
• ...and more!

name: Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop: Deluxe Edition
description:
Collect everything Uncle Chop's Rocket Shop has to offer in this convenient (if we don't say so ourselves) bundle. It contains the following:
• Base Game
• Soundtrack
• Deluxe Skin and Artbook

name: Fatal Fury: City of the Wolves - Special Edition
description:
After 26 years, FATAL FURY is back!

Contents:
- Base game
- Season Pass 1
- DLC Character 1 (Scheduled for: Summer 2025)
- DLC Character 2 (Scheduled for: Summer 2025)
- DLC Character 3 (Scheduled for: Fall 2025)
- DLC Character 4 (Scheduled for: Winter 2025)
- DLC Character 5 (Scheduled for: Early 2026)

[Special Bonus]
- Pre-order Bonus
Early Access: 3 Days (Playable from April 21, 2025)

- DLC Costume: “FATAL FURY 2: TERRY”
* Digital Version: Bonus included if you purchase the game by April 23, 2025.
* Preorder costume bonus may be released as paid DLC in the future.

name: The Storied Sword
description:
The Storied Sword is an action-platformer for retro consoles. Developed by Bite The Chili Productions and Raft Labs Interactive and published by Orc Face Games.

Assume the mantle of the mysterious folk hero Candlemaster Cedric or the elusive Orchid of Mourning, and wall-jump your way through the trials this fast-paced, multi-scrolling platformer has to offer.

Inspired by classics like Tecmo’s Ninja Gaiden and Sunsoft’s Batman, The Storied Sword is sure to raise the challenge level for NES Homebrew platformers and bring players the 8-bit twitch-combat style they know and love.

name: C.A.S.T
description: C.A.S.T is a third-person PvE extraction shooter playable solo or in co-op. Select your character and loadout to battle enemy hordes, evade anomalies, and complete objectives across handcrafted maps with dynamic procedural elements.

name: GlitchGuesser
description:
Step back into the nostalgia of the early internet with GlitchGuesser, the ultimate party game that turns pixelated chaos into a thrilling guessing competition! As distorted, compressed images gradually become clear, it’s a race against time to figure out what you’re seeing. Can you guess before anyone else?

Whether it’s a movie still, an anime character, a famous brand, or even custom creations, GlitchGuesser offers endless fun for players of all skill levels.

name: Psycho Harrier
description: A doujin recreation of the rail-shooter Space Harrier with Athena Asamiya from SNK's Psycho Soldier.

name: Grand Theft Auto: Director's Cut
description: Grand Theft Auto: Director's Cut is a video game compilation, developed by DMA Design and published by Rockstar Games. It was first released in May 1999. The compilation contains two discs - Grand Theft Auto and Grand Theft Auto: London 1969.

name: Good Coffee, Great Coffee
description: Wake up and smell the coffee because TapBlaze's newest simulation cooking game, Good Coffee, Great Coffee, is finally here! Prepare delicious drinks, experiment with new flavors, decorate your shop, and manage cafe costs to become the best barista in town!

name: Thor: Bring the Thunder
description: Play Thor: Bring the Thunder game to explore the fascinating realm of Asgard! Can you help our hero defend his home from the forces of evil?

name: The Terminator
description:
The SNES game based on James Cameron's classic 1984 film is an action game where the player takes the role of Kyle Reese, sent from the future to protect Sarah Connor from the Terminator.

The game has two kinds of levels: in several scrolling platform levels, Reese runs and jumps, shooting at Terminators (in the future war level that begins the game), street punks or policemen.

The film's chase scenes are recreated in two driving sequences. Viewed from behind, Reese and Sarah must escape the Terminator's pursuit in their car, dodging incoming traffic and avoiding the Terminator's fire.

name: Make Good Choices
description: You’re just trying to get home. It’s only a quarter mile. One street. What could go wrong.

name: Dragon Ball Z: Earth Defender
description: Sin descripción

name: The Terminator
description:
The J2ME/Java mobile phone version, based on the film of the same name.

Enemies enter the screen either from left, right, top or bottom of the screen. The screen is divided into nine parts (one part for each button of the phone). Press the appropriate button to shoot the target inside that part of the screen. Beware: some enemies require more than a simple shot. Bonuses are falling from the sky (can be points, grenades or life). Pick them up to survive. You can also enter a shop where you can buy special weapons that will allow you to kill enemies faster.

name: Terminator
description:
Terminator for the Atari 8-Bit is a platform shooter game.

The main character of the game will be transferred to five different periods of history: Stone Age, Ancient Egypt, Medieval Malbork, Oklahoma City in XIX century, Los Angeles 1993. The player's task is to find the indicated number of the chips, kill the cyborg guardian and reach the next level teleporter. Terminator may use arms and bombs in the fight against numerous enemies, although the guardian cyborg is immune to the fist attack. In exceptional cases, like stuck in place with no return, Terminator may immediately relocate himself to the start position, although this ability is limited to five times use.

name: The Terminator
description: Made with Shoot'Em-Up Construction Kit, or SEUCK, The Terminator could be described as a Commando clone. Set in post-apocalyptic future after Skynet took over and humans lost the war, you're part of the resistance fighting against the robot overlords.

name: Mega Man New Menace
description: It's a Mega Man fan game!

name: Super Mario Odyssey: Google Translated
description: Almost the entirety of Super Mario Odyssey has been run through multiple layers of Google Translate.

name: Morning Star
description:
Discover the mysteries of a forgotten world in Morning Star. Explore a vast, decaying land full of strange creatures and ancient ruins. Wander through breathtaking, magical places, but also venture into shadowy, haunting, and dangerous realms, all brought to life with stunning hand-drawn 2D visuals.

Morning Star is an atmospheric Metroidvania that plunges you into a mysterious world filled with both haunting darkness and breathtaking beauty. As a cloaked figure with no memory of your past, you wield a powerful weapon and embark on a journey through a vast, interconnected realm. Along the way, you'll uncover secrets, confront terrifying creatures, and piece together a story that forces you to question your identity.

name: Debug Deadline
description: The main character is hired as a debugger at the game company “Dokidoki Games”! With a time limit of one week, will he be able to find the bug safely? The debugging work with fate on the line begins now!

name: Threefold Recital
description: Threefold Recital is set in an oriental fantasy world where the metropolis of Bluescales faces turmoil after a long golden age. The mix of magic, modern, and ancient technologies challenges governance, while tensions between humans, beastlings, and dragons grow. In the shadows, a crisis looms. A 2D platformer with puzzles.

name: Can We Still Get High
description: Embark on an exciting journey with your friends or on your own! To reach the top, you'll have to solve challenging puzzles, overcome dangerous obstacles, and coordinate with each other. Laser communication is both a blessing and a challenge!

name: The Treasures of Montezuma
description:
The objective in this tile matching game is to collect all of the sparkling gems in a level before the time runs out on the ticking pocket watch. The number needed for the level is displayed above the main grid. Swap one stone at a time by choosing a pair, which trade places with a click, slowly eliminating all those which contain gemstones. The entire board can be shuffled twice and hints can be purchased for the cost of points.

There are also timed mini-games sprinkled throughout the game which provide more opportunities to earn gold stars.

name: The Treasures of Montezuma
description: Sin descripción

name: Etrian Odyssey Mobile
description:
The first ever Etrian Odyssey game was released exclusively for I-appli devices in Japan.
As of today, the game is considered lost media.

name: The Treasures of Montezuma
description: Sin descripción

name: Götz
description:
Goetz is a challenging game. But if you have a soft spot for planning ahead and making your units help each other to create a choreography that will bring the enemies to their knees, Goetz is for you.

Each solved mission is accompanied by a rewarding narrative piece, lovingly illustrated and fully voiced by a cast of over 12 voice-over artists. These not only seamlessly tie into the gameplay, but will draw you into a captivating story of friendship and intrigue that never takes itself too seriously.

name: Terminator 2D: No Fate
description: Play as Sarah Connor and the T-800 through a variety of thrilling missions as they take on the T-1000 and try to put a stop to Skynet’s plans before the human race is annihilated. Lead the Resistance as John Connor in the future, fighting on the front lines as mankind’s only hope in the War Against the Machines. In this unique story blending iconic scenes from ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide.

name: British Mario Vs. I.M. Meen
description: Sin descripción

name: Chinese Online Game
description: The player will play the role of an older unmarried young man Lao Wang, because of the lack of money for marriage in thinking of ways to accidentally be attracted by the pop-up ads of an online game endorsed by a certain celebrity, and the gears of destiny began to turn at that moment.

name: Wukong Fight in Kaoria
description: This is a single player action adventure game that includes mythological themed character actions and role-playing, You can use regular attacks and skills, spells, such as magic, celestial phenomena, and body fixing spells, to Fight and defeat the enemies you encounter.

name: The Simpsons: Night of the Dolphin!
description:
It's the ultimate battle for Springfield!

Based on the TREEHOUSE OF HORROR episode segment, choose a citizen and duke it out with some deadly dolphins looking to take over the town! Stand your ground against the endless streaming horde of aquatic attackers and push them back to the ocean!

name: Heist Schoolers
description: Heist your own school to get the exams' answers and discover why so many students have disappeared in Noirmont High. Spooky and nostalgic.

name: Louise Kills The Belchers!
description:
An afternoon nap interrupted by orders...to kill!
It's a bloody day on Ocean Avenue as Louise takes down the Belcher family. Her favorite toy Kuchi Kopi speaks to her and demands sacrifice. Armed with items found around the house and a dangerous mind, she's serving up murder and its a taste that can't be beat!

name: Doors: The Game!
description: Doors is a 2D platformer based on the animated series of the same name. For over 10 years Doors has been a collaborative effort featuring a record-breaking amount of artists coming together, each designing and animating their own room linked together to form one long adventure!

name: Roger Kills The Smiths!
description: Murder the members of the Smith Family from the hit tv show "American Dad". Explore the residence and destroy your targets using a variety of weapons.

name: The Coyote Kills The Road Runner!
description: After so many years. So many failed attempts. The coyote is going to do it. Finally, the Coyote will KILL the Road Runner! But is it just the law of the jungle, survival of the fittest? Or is there something more...sinister...behind the Wiley old coyote's motivations?

name: We Are Alive
description: We Are Alive is a Co-Op horror game, that can be played with at least 1 and up to 4 players. You are a detective and your mission is to investigate the old psychiatric hospital and find out the truth. Your standard equipment is a flashlight and a gun.

name: Bewilder House: Enhanced Edition
description:
Bewilder House is a classic first-person horror puzzle game that challenges your perception and willpower. Trapped in shifting mazes where the walls open and close when you're not looking, you'll need to rely on your mind and first-person controls to navigate a deceptive funhouse that manipulates your surroundings and your sense of reality. Every corner hides a new obstacle; every escape is just another illusion.

This enhanced edition brings minor improvements that breathe new life into the classic Bewilder House experience, making it easier to immerse yourself in the twisted horrors lurking within. Key Features:

Immersive Horror Atmosphere: Feel the pressure as you confront the unsettling twists and turns of a world that isn’t as it seems.

Challenging Puzzles: Solve mind-bending puzzles that play with both your sense of direction and your reality.

Enhanced Performance: Smoother frame rates and optimized controls for a more responsive and enjoyable experience.Note: The enhanced edition has no extra in-game content compared to the original.

name: Jianling: The Chosen Soul
description: Jianling is a Taiwanese RPG set in Chinese mythology.

name: A Person Stands on an Empty Stage
description: A surrealist game about acting, identity, and words.

name: Psychopomp
description: Play as Hermes, the Psychopomp, tasked with collecting letters left around the ruins and delivering them to trains running across the vast ocean. Fly, glide, and explore forgotten ruins.

name: Digital Football League
description: A Blaseball inspired American Football sim

name: The Sisterhood Mansion
description: The Sisterhood Mansion is a light fantasy adventure game with pixel art that combines life simulation and management elements, inspired by the cultures of China’s southwestern ethnic minorities.

name: Jumpo World
description: Run, jump & hide! get as far as possible in the bizarre world of jumpo world. you only have one life, make it count.

name: Ryahs Rhythm
description: Ryah's Rhythm: Relaxing Games invites you into a world where your creativity is the key to relaxation and enjoyment. Design and personalize your ultimate retreat, from dream homes and lush gardens to intricate greenhouses and whimsical treehouses. Embrace the serene ambiance enhanced by cozy vibes and a tailored selection of relaxing soundtracks.

name: Sanguis Luna
description:
Wake up in the darkness of a cold, unfamiliar cellar, with the distant echo of footsteps that shouldn't be there.

Sanguis Luna throws you into a living nightmare, where every shadow hides a secret and every sound fills you with growing terror. You are alone, with no memory of how you ended up in that cursed house, but one thing is certain: someone, or something, is watching you...

name: Scramble Animal Words
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Super Dimension Fortress Macross
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Warrior Blade
description:
Hear the murmur of fate:
“Go forth hero, to the kingdom at the end of the earth!”

name: Dragons vs. Balloons TD
description: Defend your kingdom with powerful dragons and crush waves of balloons

name: The Golden Eagle
description: action-packed adventure game

name: Bright Side: Quiz
description: Compete with family and friends to uncover the ultimate quiz champion!

name: Pickle Invasion
description: Sin descripción

name: Cursed Digicam
description: You receive a cursed digital camera that captures ghosts from a strange website. The website allows you to liberate your loved ones by uploading images of their spirits using the camera. You decide to go to the nearest park where your girl was last seen.

name: Clothing Supermarket Store Simulator
description: Unleash your inner fashion mogul in Clothing Supermarket Store Simulator! This immersive game combines the bustling world of supermarket management with the exciting world of fashion retail. Build your dream clothing empire, from a cozy boutique to a sprawling fashion megastore.

name: Tsumi no Hikari Rendez-vous
description: Sin descripción

name: Germanfest
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Estate Classic
description: Sin descripción

name: Ketz: Galactic Overlords
description: Ketz: Galactic Overlords is a roguelite RPG bullet heaven with a universe blending Science and Fantasy, where you challenge the dark forces that disrupt the galactic balance on the planet Ketz. Witness the deep stories of Galactic Leaders who oppose the disruption of galactic balance and support you with various blessings. Discover the dynamic connections between them and uncover the mysterious secrets of the planet Ketz!

name: MyPawnShop
description:
Have you always dreamed of running your own pawn shop? Now it's possible with MyPawnShop!

You can buy and sell hundreds of items of many different types. Musical instruments, weapons, art objects and much more!

Become rich by negotiating with your customers when buying and selling.

Clean and repair your items to earn even more money, with different tools at your disposal (found at different vendors in the game).

Manage your store as you wish with different storage units available as well as your storage reserve to temporarily store your items to be repaired or cleaned.

name: Stranger Watch
description: In 'Stranger Watch' players step into the shoes of an elementary school student in a town plagued by recent sightings of suspicious figures. As they make their way home, it’s up to them to spot and report these lurking dangers

name: Please Knock: Before Entering My Room
description: Sin descripción

name: Spectrum of the Puddle
description: Sin descripción

name: Killing Floor III: Day One Edition
description:
The Flatline Tactical Bundle; 'Flatliner' weapon skin, 'Fear the Reaper' weapon trinket and 'Special Action Force' player card. Also includes (retail exclusive) Clamefield Patrol Character Skins cosmetic DLC.

The Battle Begins With Nightfall

It’s 2091 and megacorp Horzine has produced the ultimate army: an obedient horde of bioengineered monstrosities called zeds. Now, only the rebel group Nightfall stands between these infernal creations and the future of humanity.

Killing Floor 3 is the next installment in the legendary action/horror series. This intense FPS puts you in the boots of a Nightfall specialist joining forces with up to five teammates to battle waves of zeds, earn dosh, unlock skills, and build the ultimate arsenal.

name: Waking up in LS
description:
Waking up in LS is a short exploration videogame where you play as a usual citizen in "Linha de Sintra", the area where a railway link connects Lisbon and Sintra.

As a resident of this unique area, you'll come across a cast of bizarre and outlandish characters, each with their own hilarious quirks and idiosyncrasies.

Explore Queluz´s train station, residential areas, and strange and surreal corners. You'll come across bizarre situations that will make you laugh out loud and shake your head in disbelief.

"Waking up in LS" is a game that will keep you entertained and amused for a couple minutes, with its pixel art graphics, and a irreverent sense of humour. Whether you like exploration games or just want to laugh, "Waking up in LS" will make you smile and leave you wanting more.

name: Anpanman wo Sagase!
description: Sin descripción

name: Arena Breakout: Season 7 – Secured Gear No Fear
description:
Arena Breakout is available for download worldwide with the new Season 7 update, ""SECURED GEAR, NO FEAR"". Download and enjoy the latest shooter with tens of millions of players around the world! Eliminate adversaries head-on, with stealth, or bypass the bullets altogether. Players have the freedom to fight however they desire. Escape the combat area alive for a chance to strike it rich, but be prepared to fight for survival.
Please note that your feedback will be processed by the Arena Breakout team for improving the game, responding to you, and/or providing support and troubleshooting, such as addressing and remediating technical issues and bugs.

name: Videophobia
description: You are in a room without windows or doors. The TV dimly illuminates the room. What is this, a box? How to open it? After solving the riddle, you find the TV remote control. Click... a door appeared. You step into the darkness and hear laughter... turn around and find out what's behind the screen.

name: Writer. Chapter 1
description: You, the legendary writer, the “King of Horror,” find yourself at the center of a nightmare. A mysterious place, frighteningly familiar, hides sinister secrets. Explore locations, solve riddles, escape from the monster, collect a story that will become a new masterpiece... if you survive.
