name: Fantasy Online 2
description: A rich 2D pixel art MMORPG full of adventure. Master diverse skills, join a guild, explore pixelated zones, and engage in simple fun MMORPG combat. Hundreds of items are waiting for you to collect across 4 characters! Join the fun today!

name: Omoiyari wo Hagukumu Katarikake Ehon: Miffy to Asobou Utaou
description: Sin descripción

name: Oekaki Nokoshite Print Shichaou! Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Slugterra: Dark Waters
description: Based on the Slugterra animated series, Slugterra: Dark Waters, players take on the role of Eli Shane to explore the underground world of Slugterra and protect its lands from the forces of evil. The game combines real-time strategic combat with the use of “slugs,” collectible creatures with special abilities that can be evolved for greater effectiveness in battle. Featuring a plot inspired by the series, the game offers varied missions, diverse environments and strategic challenges, remaining faithful to the animated universe through detailed graphics and engaging gameplay.

name: Doom: The Gallery Experience
description:
DOOM: The Gallery Experience was created as an art piece designed to parody the wonderfully pretentious world of gallery openings.

In this experience, you will be able to walk around and appreciate some fine art while sipping some wine and enjoying the complimentary hors d’oeuvres in the beautifully renovated and re-imagined E1M1 of id Software's DOOM (1993).

name: Legion Defense
description: Legion Defense is a TD game made with the Y3 Editor that swaps boring mercenaries for epic hero showdowns! In special rounds, you’ll face enemy heroes and feel the thrill of battle. The KOF mode allows for 3v3 matches to compete for the top spot. join the ultimate battle now!

name: Sterling Shroud
description: Sterling Shroud is a point-and-click atmospheric horror game with a focus on navigation and puzzle solving. Can you escape the forest alive?

name: Stimulation Clicker
description: Stimulation Clicker is a fast-paced clicker game where players click a button to accumulate "stimulation" points. These points can be used to automate point collection and unlock various upgrades and achievements. The game intentionally overloads the player with visual and auditory stimuli, mirroring the chaotic nature of the modern internet.

name: Zoo Keeper
description: This is a Homebrew port of the original Zoo Keeper from the arcade for the Atari 2600 by Champ Games.

name: Mini Gunn
description: A fan-made, fun-sized version of Samurai GUNN 2.

name: Underground Mission
description: Underground Mission is an unlicensed shooter puzzle game published by Power Joy Ltd.. The objective of the game is to collect all the items dispersed around the stages and rescue a kidnapped soldier.

name: Doubutsu-jima no Chobigurumi 2: Tama-chan Monogatari
description: The main characters try to use the sweet smell of sweets as a signal to tell Tama-chan's mother where the lost Tama-chan is. Collect recipes and ingredients to make sweets in over 50 mini-games.

name: Beat Around the Bush
description: Beat Around the Bush is a series done over YouTube shorts where the top comment got the next addition to the game. Beat Around the Bush is a game where your primary goal is to Beat around the Bush. Once you do, you did it. You won. Therefore, there's no more reason to keep playing this game.

name: Doki Doki Brazilian Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Bounty Sword: Satellaview Special Time Attack Version
description: Sin descripción

name: Astropulse: Reincarnation
description: Set on a war-torn future Earth where the planet's biological evolution was drastically altered by a meteorite strike

name: Project Deniz
description: Deniz, seeks redemption in a near-future world on the brink of collapse. Betrayed by those in power, she embarks on a journey of revenge, aiming to uncover the truth behind her betrayal.

name: Now I'm Home
description: Build your purr-fect business empire with 50+ unique cats, each with their own special talents. Collect rare breeds, create powerful combinations, and manage your growing feline empire through challenging scenarios. With 50+ distinctive cats, countless items, and endless strategic possibilities

name: Viking Days Remaster
description: Face the domestic life of the fine upstanding viking in 17 mini challenges.

name: Exercise Your Demons!
description: Unleash your inner beast and battle back hordes of demons and beads of sweat. With the finest fitness trainers from the Infernal Gymnasium guiding your every move, you’ll throw down in your living room to save the world from an untimely demonic demise.

name: Black Beacon
description: Black Beacon is an action-packed RPG set in a world where ancient prophecies come to life. After the arrival of the "Seer," a mysterious black monolith known as the "Beacon" activates, unleashing strange anomalies around the Tower of Babel. These anomalies are far from mythical—they hide powerful secrets that could reshape humanity's future.

name: Sheep Seeker
description: Sheep Seeker is a fast-paced, co-op 3D platformer where you and a friend race through dynamic levels to catch every sheep as fast as possible.

name: Swap
description:
Swap - third person adventure game. Explore colorful planets with unique landscapes, atmosphere and other features. From sand dunes to ice fields. Remember, each planet hides its own secrets.

Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles using the cat skills of your four-legged friend. Jump, climb, slide and use your cat instincts to get to the finish line.

Collect various objects and discover new mechanics.

Meet charismatic characters. With hostile alien creatures that will prevent you from reaching your goal.

Feel all the fear of the unknown in the skin of a small cat. To overcome all the obstacles, you need dexterity, agility, curiosity, inquisitiveness and an extra 9 lives.

Swap is a game that will make you fall in love with it from the first "meow", with its exciting gameplay, picturesque and varied locations, interesting puzzles, adventurous spirit, as well as a fluffy and cute main character. The game will become your new and ideal way to spend time with interest.

name: Brew in Blizzard
description: Sin descripción

name: My Bed, Your Grave
description: Sin descripción

name: Ropebound
description: Swing through ropes and overcome obstacles.

name: Korolevskaya Noch
description: "Royal Night" is a Russian visual novel in the horror genre. The story takes place in a remote pioneer camp on the Volga River. The boy Anton, full of hopes to find real friends, goes there, but unwittingly learns about the terrible past of this camp...

name: Lingo 2
description: Lingo 2 blends word puzzles and impossible geometry, with brand new puzzle mechanics and a large, colorful world to discover. Welcome back!

name: Madness on Display
description: Venture into the world of chilling psychological horror, where the line between reality and nightmare is thinner than a spider's web. Grandview is not just a game, it is a test for your nerves and mind.

name: Bipolar: The Tube
description: East-Asia-theme horror visual novel with tarot elements. This game shares the same world with When the Wind Knocks (Ready to Kill) and The Dead Daughter. If you have played that game, you will meet an old friend here.

name: Labyrinth of Wild Abyss: LayeRedux
description: A horror game about paranoia and endurance predation. You cannot beat the monsters, you can only outrun. They are slow, they aren't smart, but they are patient, they are many, and they are powerful.

name: SweetCat
description: Your family has gone on vacation without you. Can you help little Milio until they return? Feed him, dress him, decorate his room, and play with him so he doesn’t feel lonely in this virtual pet simulator.

name: Liminal Shift
description: A unique atmospheric suspense game developed using the latest Unreal Engine 5 technologies such as Lumen and Nanite. With every step you take, Liminal Shift pushes you deeper into an eerie, unsettling experience like no other.

name: Ritual
description: A single player episode with 6+4 levels and start map made by Zothique and Sock.

name: Bluejeweled
description: A mod for bejeweled 3 to add more blue

name: A Merchant's Promise
description: First person Medieval Trading & Transport Simulator. Start as a Peasant and work your way to Royalty as you carefully handle and transport your goods through a stylized Medieval World!

name: What If...? An Immersive Story
description: You have been chosen! Step inside the limitless possibilities of Marvel Studios’ What If…? universe in this immersive Disney+ Original story exclusively on Apple Vision Pro, where you’ll be transported to different worlds. Come face-to-face with variants of your favorite characters and learn to harness the power of the Infinity Stones. But, …everything may not be all that it seems.

name: Crystal Quest
description: The puzzles include a tile-matching memory game and a timed top-down maze sprint (find the exit before the time runs out). In each subsequent area, the difficulty of these puzzles increases, and the amount of clothes the demi-humans wear after a puzzle has been solved decreases.

name: Encounter Dinosaurs
description:
Come face-to-face with our prehistoric past and encounter life...66 million years ago!

Welcome to the world of the Cretaceous, where giants walked the Earth and Mother Nature reigned supreme.

“Encounter Dinosaurs” is something you need to experience to believe.

name: Sezhar's Shell Cells
description:
Just imagine that you died and some day just woke up, but not at home like you wanted to, but in an endless void of... nothing?
Sezhar isn't mad at you, she is just frustrated.
Be so nice and endure her wrath a bit longer. :)

name: Amenti
description: A photographer enters the Great Pyramids to photograph Pharaoh Rudamon’s remains, but is soon overwhelmed by a sinister curse, as the ancient tomb awakens dark forces that claw at his sanity.

name: Fortnite Festival: Season 7
description: Sin descripción

name: Fruity Rogue
description: Fruity Rogue is a fast-paced roguelike top-down shooter where everything revolves around fruits! Explore randomly generated levels, battle fruit enemies, collect items, and discover game-changing synergies. With each run, unlock characters and weapons, each with their own playstyle and abilities.

name: Project Net
description: Sin descripción

name: Tamagopanda no Muchuu Land ni Youkoso!: Waku-waku Taiken Stamp Rally 100
description: The main title for the console ePico, made by SEGA FAVE.

name: Soreike! Anpanman: Hajimete Dekita yo! Oboeta yo! Anpanman Hitori de Dekichatta!
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Princess: Magical Academy
description: Sin descripción

name: 3001: A MILF Odyssey
description: In this adult visual novel, you will play as Ensign [Your Name], and explore the Alpha Quadrant, under Captain Kateway's orders, with the help of her sexy crew. Protect the Federation and uphold its values by joining the newly created Mobile Interstellar Liaison Force (MILF). Do a good job and you won't stay an Ensign for long!

name: Vida
description: Vida was Conada Soft 's first major project created in DIV. It is set on Mars and was originally going to have a final chapter on Earth, but it was scrapped.

name: Penguin Origins
description: Penguin Origins strives to deliver an experience reminiscent of the original game, based on when it started nearly 20 years ago. Enjoy the original looks and feels of how it started, with some remixed elements!

name: Hello Love: 18 Again
description: Unexpectedly back at 18, you embark on a thrilling and sweet campus rebirth journey with the memories! The campus goddess, the sexy girl, the childhood sweetheart, the frigid CEO, the gentle teacher. Who will ignite your heart among the dreams and regrets of youth? Relive old dreams without regrets!

name: Pio
description: Prove your strength in the world of stars and become the brightest one of all! PIO faces trials to show his light and challenges himself to become the most radiant star.

name: Pokémon Study: Hikaruze! Pokémon Typing PC
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Crown: Sin Eater
description: Explore the beautiful and detailed environments of Crown Nation, breed endless monsters with the most robust and polished true crossbreeding system devised in a video game.

name: Brotato + Abyssal Terrors DLC Bundle
description: The Brotato + Abyssal Terrors DLC Bundle is a Bundle including Brotato and it's Abyssal Terrors DLC.

name: Ghost Story: Love Destiny
description: Sin descripción

name: Snekmek
description: A thrilling twist on the classic Snake game. Dodge bullets from evil fruits, collect weapons to arm your snake, and if hit, switch to platformer mode, flying with a jetpack to defeat the fruit enemies!

name: PianoVision
description: Become a PianoVisionary with the world's premiere VR Music Teacher. PianoVision accelerates your piano learning using Mixed Reality and hand tracking. Connect a MIDI keyboard or play on a flat surface with the Virtual Piano!

name: Dino Running from a Furry: Gamesforfarm
description: Run, Dino, run! You can't fall into the clutches of Mr. Furry

name: An Outland Village
description: A father and mother visit their daughter's home in Beijing to discuss their father's understanding of life and memories of their past relationship with their mother. A short, free narrative-focused game.

name: A Gracewind Tale: Midnight Shift with Lenny Motts
description: It's a cold December night in Gracewind. You're about to close shop at the Gracewind Video, when a man named Lenny Motts appears on all the television screens. He has decided to play a little game with you, will you play or not?

name: A Gracewind Tale: The Leeds Murder
description:
The Leeds Murder is a direct sequel to "Do You Copy?" in the Gracewind Universe.

You play as a detective looking for a missing person lost in Gracewind Park. Use your investigative skills to find out the truth.

Discover more history of Gracewind as you discover the truth of Michael Leeds.

name: Escape Road 2
description: Throughout the course of Escape Road 2, players will find themselves in a variety of dangerous circumstances, ranging from urban settings to natural terrains, each of which is packed with its own set of challenges. The user-friendly controls of the game make it simple for players to manage their avatar, enabling them to quickly navigate difficulties, such as jumping over barriers, sliding under obstructions, and running away from threats.

name: Sit-Back Attack
description:
Sit-Back Attack is a game where you can sit back and let it grind for you!
It is an Idle RPG WITHOUT any MTX!

Features 45+ different classes, 500+ different skills, unlimited amount of build options to help make the team of 4 heroes you control defeat over 300 monsters!

A very in-depth interface that allows you to see every facet of battle, stats, and more to help you decide how to make your team even stronger!

All classes have unique character art and their own skills, strengths, and weaknesses.

You can choose from 1 of 4 pets to help bolster your team and you control when it uses it's special attack.

An alchemy craft that allows you to use potions on your allies and enemies manually! This craft can be improved with a characters skills and gear.

So much more!

name: Maze Mice
description: Maze Mice is a bullet heaven roguelite where time only moves when you move. Collect dots, level up, choose upgrades, and avoid cats. All at your own pace.

name: Everything Ends In 0
description: The world ends in 1 hour. It can't be saved. Wanna chat?

name: Blockbuster
description: Blockbuster was released by Elcon Industries in 1977. Blockbuster is an arcade cabinet featuring five different games that can be played: Magic Squares, Tennis (Pong variant), Soccer (Pong variant), Gravity Ball (Pong variant with gravity) and Blockbuster (Breakout variant). Depending on the game up to four players can play. The game is available in four different cabinet styles (round cocktail, octagonal cocktail, rectangular cocktail and cabinet).

name: BlockBuster
description: The mobile game Block Buster is a Breakout variant. The player controls a paddle at the bottom of the screen used to to hit a ball, which in turn hits the blocks. Sometimes when the ball hits a block, an item drops from it, providing multiple balls, a change of speed or altering the paddle size. To move on to a next stage, all blocks need to be removed from the screen. The game has 8 stages.

name: Ford Street Racing: XR Edition
description:
The Australian release of Ford Bold Moves Street Racing (EU: Ford Street Racing). The PS2 version replaces some existing cars with Aussie originals, while the PSP version adds these cars in new slots.

It is completely identical to the original version, but contains 4 additional cars synonymous with the history of Ford in Australia: the 1970 Ford XY GT Falcon, the 1970 Ford XY GTHO Falcon (Phase III), the 2003 Falcon XR8 Ute and the Australian Falcon XR8.

name: Galaga 3D Impact
description: In Galaga 3D Impact, players control a starship from a first-person perspective throughout a series of levels, destroying formations of enemies and avoiding collision with their projectiles. The game was exclusive to Pac-Man & Galaga Dimensions. It was designed around the gyro controls and 3D effects of the Nintendo 3DS

name: Cataclysm Wars
description: The Empire is under attack, and only its mighty armies can save it! Shame you aren't in charge of those, then. Lead an outmatched militia through overwhelming odds in this turn-based strategy game, and save your nation from collapse. Or, lead the dogged Syrinx foe and crush the Empire!

name: Yedesna Shoots 3
description: Yedesna shoots 3 is an asteroids like game where you play as, uh, Yedesna!

name: Total Loadout
description: Total Loadout is a PvP inventory management auto battler where heroes and villains from across space and time clash with powerful weapons! Choose your Celebrity with special abilities and items, then outwit opponents turn by turn by arranging your inventory tactically to build an unbeatable Loadout.

name: The Travelers
description: The travelers is a 2d mmo and text-based adventure. explore a massive world full of worn cities and dusty buildings. discover items, build bases, engage in combat, or work together to solve the wasteland's hidden mystery.

name: Windy Creator
description: With just 1 year left to live, the terminally ill Wind I's seemingly incurable illness has endlessly vexed Heal III, the greatest doctor in the land. But one fateful day, Heal III hatches a plan to even the odds against Windi's sickness, and to cure her once and for all. 9999 Wind Is are better than 1... right? But cures for such ails don't come cheap. Raise a legion of mighty Wind I clones, expand your clinic, and send Wind I to work and on adventures to secure funding as you research and develop the cure to end all cures! Part raising sim, part board game-esque RPG, and 100% classic VIPRPG fun in Kiito's signature style.

name: DC Task Force
description: DC Task Force is a game where you explore the DC universe, visiting classic cities and planets, assembling your own Justice League team and recruiting members to protect planet Earth from an alien invasion. This campaign can be completed in just over an hour, but would require at least 7 hours to explore the entire universe and recruit all possible characters.

name: Re:Ver Project - Tokyo
description: Co-developed by Toei Animation and indie developer Nestopi, is a survival suspense adventure game set in modern Tokyo depicted in pixel art. Yukinori Amane whos falsely accused of a crime, uses his survival skills to evade the police and uncover the real culprit.

name: Astra: Era of Anguish
description: Astra: Era of Anguish is an RPG prequel set in the GOR3 universe. Explore the valley of Laywind and unravel a grand mystery.

name: Sledding Game
description: Sledding Game is a cozy, online multiplayer game about sledding, relaxing, and hanging out with your friends.

name: Burrow Wing
description:
You wake up, feeling a bit hollow – and stumble down a hole. Now you're stuck here. Burrow Wing is an atmospheric exploration/adventure game about getting lost in a desolate subterranean expanse.

In a tightly packed hand-crafted map with two square kilometers of vertically interconnected sprawling caverns filled with branching paths to explore at your leisure, as well as over fifteen smaller areas accessible from the main map - each meticulously crafted and filled with collectables, enemies and quests.

name: TheLostWoods
description: You find yourself lost deep in a strange forest. Will you be able to find the right path and escape this mysterious forest safely?

name: Super Karate Kid
description: Super Karate Kid is a fan-made remake of the 1987 game "The Karate Kid", which was developed by Atlus and published by LJN for the Nintendo Entertainment System.

name: Hide Time
description: Hide Time is a story-driven horror game filled with huge variety of puzzles where you play as an new employee of Passion Oasis. Explore that huge complex, do your tasks and uncover mysteries of your past.

name: Puck
description: Hop on your skates and jump into a physics based hockey game. No rules, no timeouts, just get the puck in the goal. May the best team win!

name: Bad Manors
description: On Friday the 13th, your plans for a spooky Halloween night are dashed when you show up alone at the escape room reserved by your friend. You consider going home when a handsome stranger offers to accompany you. Maybe the night is saved after all… Or so you thought.

name: Pokemon RBGenesis+
description: Re-experience Kanto in an all new light! Pokémon RBGenesis aims to recreate the feeling of playing Pokémon Red and Blue on your Gameboy for the first time. Using the colorful art style of the Gen 2 GSC games; Pokémon from gens 1-8, And all new events and characters, Kanto will feel nostalgic and fresh at the same time! RBG ups the expected difficulty of the Kanto region to bring a new challenge to returning players. Search the region for new wild Pokémon encounters based on the Day/Night cycle, or for the various Mega Stones and battle items scattered across the region! Discover all new areas, such as the River Valley, Deep Forest, or Mt. Moon Summit! Become the Champion of the Kanto region in a brand new way, and explore all new mysteries!

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Hunter's Song
description:
“Old Man Link” is paid a visit by an old acquaintance but what’s precipitated this visit?

Why, another adventure of course… But why indeed?

Featuring the following changes to A Link to the Past:

New Sprites
Three New Dungeons
A White Beard
A cute little Minish garbed in full armor
Picasso’s Peace Dove
A Buzzing Hero
A Capra Hircus

and so much more…

Take courage. Experience “Link” with a voice(gasp), stripped of sword and youth(double gasp). Rely on wisdom(or save state(no you’re better than that(but it’s so convenient(fair enough)))) to not soft lock the game from that bomb puzzle(triple gasp to admit the game’s broken so brazenly).

name: Under Your Spell
description: "Under Your Spell" is an immersive text-based magic school and dating simulator, drawing inspiration from beloved games like True Love 95 and Persona 4. As the protagonist, you'll juggle the challenges of school life while navigating the complexities of romance and participating in the highly anticipated "Cup of Cathal"

name: Pushover
description: this bunny is out on a trip to the city, and you're tagging along on the other end!

name: cr4nkup
description: Cr4nkup is a cycling program that combines real training and elements from the gaming world in a huge virtual world. Train online with your friends from all over the world and compete in various competitions.

name: The Conundrum Collection
description:
The Conundrum Collection is a browser-based Choose Your Own Adventure series of two short stories offering multiple endings and branching pathways based on the decisions of the reader.

Grimm - Neil Burkman is forced to confront the outcomes of past actions that led him to a seemingly fatal end. He's given a chance to alter this unfavorable outcome. But at what cost?

Hoodie Seize'N - Ella Gray lives in the slums of Proctor City. An area where kidnappings involving young women is at an all time high. After a close friend's disappearance, Ella dives into the hidden criminal underworld in an attempt to rescue her friend before it's too late.

name: Kingdom Rush Vengeance: Pirate Kings
description: It's time to hoist the sails and reclaim the seas in the name of the Dark Lord: pillage all 5 Pirate King’s islands for their hidden treasures!

name: PowerWash Simulator: Wallace & Gromit Special Pack
description:
Enter the wonderful world of Wallace & Gromit in PowerWash Simulator’s next big adventure – coming soon!

Embark on a cracking cleaning adventure that’ll take you from charming British suburbs to cheesy celestial bodies. Watch this space for more info and wishlist for updates, old chum.

name: 2Unreal5Underground
description:
A fangame that aims to remake the gameplay and story of Need for Speed: Underground 2. It originally started in Unreal Engine 4, titled 2Unreal4Underground, but it has since moved to a custom version of UE5 to utilize its features.

TUFU is in active development and had an alpha release at the end of 2024.

name: Ford Bold Moves Street Racing
description:
PSP port of "Ford Bold Moves Street Racing", (released in Europe as "Ford Street Racing: L.A. Duel")

Ford Bold Moves Street Racing is the third Razorworks-developed title in the licensed Ford Racing series since they took over development in Ford Racing 2. Unlike its predecessors, this version has an urban atmosphere. The road races, off-road challenges and circuit tracks have been removed and the action has been taken entirely to the streets of Los Angeles, with 24 tracks available. As in the previous version, the 18 available cars are all Fords, ranging from the 1968 Mustang GT to the 2007 Shelby GT 500.

name: Project Butterfly
description: An open-ended, super fast-paced 2D platformer set in a futuristic world of strange, insect-like people. Take the role of several members of the local gang and shower the city in graffiti art while completing missions, doing stylish tricks and gaining experience to unlock new skills that will help you along the way, as you explore the open-ended streets of Graff City.

name: Moorhuhn VR Blast
description: Get ready to blast Moorhuhn like never before with “Moorhuhn VR Blast!” Feel the unique blend of new and nostalgic vibes as you enter Virtual Reality. Test your shooting skills in a variety of reinvented versions of the classic levels you know and love. Every level offers new challenges and new weapons to unlock. With various game modes, challenges, and leaderboards, “Moorhuhn VR Blast” offers endless hours of fun. Compete with friends to become the ultimate blaster!

name: The Ghost Treasure
description: Use your soul as a stake to gamble for a treasure of the undead captain. As long as you take the randomly distributed flintlock gun and fight a duel with the ghost pirates, you can leave with the treasure, or your soul will remain on the undead ship forever. Good luck.

name: Marvel Rivals: Season 1 - Eternal Night Falls
description: Darkness engulfs New York as the Timestream Entanglement leaves Doctor Strange trapped in the Entangled Astral Plane, scattering the Darkhold pages. Dracula and Doctor Doom disrupt the moon’s orbit, plunging the city into eternal night and unleashing an army of vampiric creatures. With the world on the brink, the Fantastic Four join forces with iconic Marvel heroes, standing together in the epic battle to break the mystical darkness with science. Ignite the battle against Dracula with the Fantastic Four in Marvel Rivals!

name: Kyra's Light
description:
Cleanse the corrupted land, bring back Kyra's Light...

Jump from tile to tile and journey across various biomes filled with traps and enemies. Reach as far as you can in a procedurally generated world. The road is endless, test your skills and adapt new strategies with various weapons and new characters. Cleanse every biome and upgrade them to dive deeper towards the source of the corruption.

name: Cybrlich and the Death Cult of Labor
description: An adrenaline fueled FPS/boomer shooter about a buff barbarian hacker taking down an evil undead corporate overlord

name: Night at the Office
description: You work late at the office not long after the death of a colleague. Throughout the night, all sorts of phenomenon begin to terrorize you, slowly uncovering the death of a fellow colleague. Who killed Joseph Anadam and why must you go through this trial to find out?

name: Null State
description:
Null State is a moddable CRPG built on classic gameplay styles and themes found in cyberpunk games from the late 80s and early 90s.

Inspired by classic cyberpunk stories (& other, older tales of downtrodden folk heroes), you will be tasked with helping the people in your community until you discover that your world is barely holding together — and about to be pushed over the brink.

name: The House of the Dead 2: Remake
description: The House of the Dead 2: Remake is a remake of the second entry in the well-known and popular rail-shooter series. Take on the lone role of a secret agent as James or Gary, or team up in co-op mode to neutralize the dangerous undead monsters standing in your way.

name: Zenless Zone Zero: Update 1.5 - Astra-nomical Moment
description:
Version 1.5 of Zenless Zone Zero, which includes:

• New Characters: Astra and Evelyn
• New Outfits for Ellen, Nicole and Astra
• New Events
• ...and more!

name: Boti: Byteland Overclocked - Bit Racing
description:
Buckle up everyone, we got some hovercraft races to do! The Bit Racing DLC adds a hovercraft garage and a collection of intricate race tracks to test your skills on.

Take on the clock to get the best time and reap the rewards for finishing in bronze, silver or gold. Collect and equip a slew of unique skins for your hovercraft to add some extra flair.

name: OnAir Airline Manager
description: Create and manage your very own airline in a persistent online world. Start small with a single aircraft, grow your fleet, and explore endless opportunities to build a thriving aviation empire.

name: Hell Maiden
description: This is an original retelling of the Italian Renaissance classic Divine Comedy by Dante Alighieri. AstralShift did confirm it will branch out from the familiar horror RPG genre of its previous titles.

name: Deficit
description: You are a corporate espionage freelancer. Your latest assignment: steal the reality-shifting Interpolator from the sprawling research labs of Project Sidereal. Use the device to escape the grueling defensive layers of Hadrian's Wall and cross the threshold into the strangest frontiers of reality.

name: Demon Dust
description: Demon Dust is a Survival Horror Dungeon Crawler with a unique, mouse driven interface. Scavenge the depths of concrete and metal while rationing supplies to stay alive.

name: Terry's Other Games
description: Hi, I'm Terry Cavanagh! You might remember me from such videogames as Dicey Dungeons, Super Hexagon, and VVVVVV. Here are a few other things I've made over the years!

name: Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed - Escape from the Coolsonian
description: A spooky point and click game where you help Scooby and Shaggy escape from a museum which has a fiendishly effective jumpscare. Made to promote the Scooby-Doo 2: Monsters Unleashed movie.

name: Zombies and Orcs
description: You have discovered ways to quickly move using teleportation and when visiting new lands you will have to protect your portals so that aggressors do not penetrate them.

name: Maniac Path 3
description: Go into the abyss of madness to go through the difficult path of a broken beast that spares no one

name: Freedom Maker
description: Seek freedom and build an infinite deck. In a cyberpunk future, use strategy and skill to overthrow AI's domination. Freedom Maker is a unique RPG blending puzzles and action.

name: Difficult times
description: Monsters are attacking!

name: Dangerous Line
description: You are a hero who faces waves of enemies who are trying to get into your kingdom and seize power in it.

name: The Mythical City 4
description: Hordes of monsters are moving towards your cities to stop them, build walls, place magic books that will attack the enemy, hire soldiers!

name: Knight's Night!
description: Knight's Night! is a retro-style 1-bit platformer. Collect items, unlock new abilities, and make your way into the evil wizard's castle to save the kingdom!

name: Stalker Together
description: Sin descripción

name: Yamizome Liberator
description: Yamizome Liberator is a modern visual novel with real-time deckbuilding combat. Plan and unleash skills in tactical 1v1 battles against magical girls, manage daytime events, and liberate heroines in a race against time. A bold mix of tactical gameplay, dark humor, and captivating storytelling!

name: Undead Realm: Ego
description: Time stands still, space warps, whispers in the dark and indescribable things are approaching you step by step. You will embark on a survival journey with several strangers in a desolate and mysterious place, and immerse yourself in a horrible battle royale full of despair from the first perspective

name: JoshGeoff Weiner Simulator
description: JoshGeoff Weiner Simulator is a quirky and humorous simulation game that lets players step into the shoes of JoshGeoff's unique worker, a character navigating through bizarre cities and locations. Set in the UK, the game blends elements of exploration and interaction with an emphasis on comedic storytelling and quirky dialogue. Players are tasked with completing unusual challenges, all while collecting things for your boss.

name: Like a Dragon: Pirate Yakuza in Hawaii - Collector's Edition
description:
A new legend begins as you step into the steel toe boots of Goro Majima, a man who has lost his memory and reinvents himself as a pirate on the open sea.

Embark on an over-the-top, modern-day pirate adventure with an ex-yakuza, now pirate captain and his crew as they engage in exhilarating combat on land and sea in the hunt for lost memories and a legendary treasure.

name: A Dual Ascent
description:
"Once upon a time, there was a mountain; a mountain so tall, it touched the sky. It was the Great Mountain of Wonders.

An Old Pilgrim, who came from a land far away, was on his way to the summit.

But a fallen Little Star had the exact same idea, for she thought she might return home, if she reached the top of the Mountain..."

name: Burger Race
description: Get ready to race at top speed in Burger Race! Which machine will be the first to cross the finish line?

name: Timelake: Time Travel Tactics
description: Timelake: Time Travel Tactics is a roguelite strategy game where you control time itself to outsmart enemies and navigate a shifting city. Predict enemy moves, set traps, and execute synchronized combos. Manage precious resources as you explore a dreamlike world filled with mystery, cosmic horror, and ever-changing challenges. Every decision ripples through time, offering endless strategic possibilities.

name: Red Blue Cell
description: This is a retro barrage flying shooting game. Drive a space fighter plane, shuttle between planets and space stations, and use powerful firepower to destroy enemy space battleships!

name: Super Wonder Boy in Monster Land
description: Port of "Wonder Boy in Monster Land" for Commodore 64, Amiga, Atari ST, Amstrad CPC, and ZX Spectrum, released in 1989.

name: Chaos Ascension
description: Survive relentless waves of monsters in this fast paced rogue lite action game. Choose your hero, defeat epic bosses, and unlock powerful upgrades in a dark, procedurally generated world.

name: Since November
description:
What are you doing with your time on Earth? Are you happy? Stay inside. We have pizza.

"Since November" is a short furry visual novel with about 12k words and four endings. It is written to be conclusive, so there will be no additional chapters. It is a game that was developed for the NovemBear 2024 Furry Visual Novel Jam.

name: Base Blitz
description: Two teams battle it out in a high-stakes capture-the-flag competition. Set on resource-filled battlegrounds, each team must protect their base while devising strategies to infiltrate the enemy's. Your flag is perched on the roof of your base just out of enemy reach, but so is theirs. The only way in? Tear down their walls by gathering resources, crafting items such as pickaxes, bombs and cannons, and launch a full-scale blitz!

name: Dataclysm
description: Embark on a journey into the heart of a digital kingdom unlike any other. Dataclysm invites you to explore a world where ancient data comes alive, and every line of code tells a story waiting to be unraveled.

name: Themis
description: THEMIS is a 3rd person puzzle platformer filled with mind-boggling challenges and non-linear narrative. Inspired by games like Portal and Dark Souls, players will be tasked with overcoming death traps and obstacles employing both wits as well as quick reflexes.

name: Persona 5: Funkin' in Starlight
description:
The Phantom Thieves have gotten another anonymous request on the Phan-Site, this time, a worried father asking that his daughter's boyfriend's heart be taken, due to his twisted desires. Doesn't seem like much trouble, so Joker takes on this request solo! Little did he expect, someone familiar to us was waiting for him...

Waiting on the shadows, the other wildcards await for a challenge in the velvet room.. The VS. Joker Full Week is here!

name: Heads Will Roll: Reforged - Threads of Destiny
description:
• French Campaign
Switch sides and swear allegiance to the French king, continuing your military career under a new banner - that of kingdom of France. Go on a new ambitious campaign against Paris' numerous rivals in order to, one by one, bring them all to submission, earning wealth and glory in the process. But don't let the glitter of gold blind you as, in the royal service, the cloaks and daggers of maligners and ill-wishers might prove to be way more dangerous than even the sharpest swords and spears of the best enemy knights.

• Bounty Hunting
Accept the offer of Grace & Glory and abandon the military career in favour of bounty hunting. Accompany your new colleagues on their travels around medieval Europe and complete various contracts, some of which might take you to rather unexpected places. They say that bounty hunters die young — find out if you got what it takes to become an exception from this rule.

• From a peasant to a king
Betrayal is the worst possible sin. However is it really that bad if the crown of the whole kingdom is at stake? Stop being a pawn in somebody else's game and make your own dash for the throne. Seizing the crown will be a challenging task, holding onto it will be even harder. But, if you've got a true monarch's ambition, the battle is worth the blood. True greatness is now within your reach — it's time to become the king or die trying!

name: The Zombie Fortress
description: A zombie game where killing means surviving.

name: Google: Squid Game
description: Upon the release of Squid Game season 2, Google added a small game to it's site when searching "Squid Game" to celebrate it's release. The game is a browser adaptation of the "Red Light, Green Light" part of the show.

name: Skystead Christmas
description: In this festive-themed hidden object game, every click costs a snowball, and every snowball requires some snow! Collect snowflakes as they are falling and try and find all 24 Skylets to win!

name: The Apartment 57
description: The Apartment 57 is a psychological horror game set in an abandoned hotel. Players explore dark hallways and uncover dark secrets. The game features immersive storytelling, classic horror elements, and a growing horror atmosphere, inspired by games like Fears to Fathom.

name: Desierto
description: This is a game about getting lost.

name: MadFut 25
description: MADFUT 25 is the 24/25 season version of this popular football card game. In this version, you will find many new features that will allow you to enjoy fun games where you will try to unlock the best football player cards.

name: Moto X3m: Pool Party
description:
Grab your bike, master the jumps and pull off sweet flips in Moto X3M Pool Party.
Race to the finish line and get all 3 stars.

name: Havoc Monkeys
description: Havoc Monkeys is a VR game which has a unique movement system, the game has multiple gamemodes and maps to ensure a long lasting play time. There's frequent updates so stay tuned!

name: Tap Derby
description: Tap Derby allows you to step into the shoes of a rookie horse trainer. Under the guidance of legendary trainer, Rusty Hayes, buy, train, and race as you grow your stable. Conquering prestigious racing events and rising to Horse Racing Stardom.

name: Pokemon Empire
description:
What is right and wrong? Who gets to decide? And why does everyone follow so blindly? Welcome to the Telius region, only months removed from a bloody civil war sparked by the actions of the tyrannical King, Tobias II. A once benevolent man who ushered in an era of prosperity and industry, he eventually plunged the region into division and violence. In the end, he was overthrown by his own people. Amidst the ensuing chaos and turmoil, a new council of representatives has taken power, supported by the revolutionaries that overthrew the king's regime. This 'grand council' is now in charge of overseeing the reconstruction of the region and establishing a new Pokemon league. But even under this supposed new stability, old fissures remain. Many Telius citizens detest the new government and how it operates and remain loyal to the longstanding traditions of supporting the nobility. This nobility and their soldiers, now on the outside looking in, has adopted the moniker 'Team Royale'. Operating from the shadows, they are a group intent on restoring the region to its former glory days under a new king. So with the region war-torn and divided, how will Telius move into the future? Enter YOU the player: the child of a noble family, you were sent away before the war began. Now that the war has ended, you, along with your best friend Alanah, return to Telius to fulfill a promise to conquer the Pokemon league and to bring the entire region of Telius into harmony once more. Can you solve the mysteries of the war, work your way through the shadows of the past, and become champion of the Telius League? Will you support the grand council, fight for the Royale loyalists, or take matters into your own hands? How will you define your legacy in Pokemon Empire?

RPG Maker Pokemon fangame with Pokemon up through Generation 9 with several rebalances to both individual Pokemon and the general systems.

name: Forklift Certified
description: Welcome to Forklift Certified, a unique single-player 3D top-down puzzle experience where you can kick back, unwind, and enjoy clever challenges at your own pace. Take control of a forklift to navigate intricate puzzles, activate mechanisms, and conquer challenges in handcrafted levels

name: Soul Of Dragon
description: Sin descripción

name: Kozue's Strange Journey 2
description: One year after taking down the supernatural threat behind a series of disappearances, Sayuri Shirasagi and her friends team up once more to unravel a new mystery!

In 2015, aliens visited the United States.

In 2115, they came back.

name: NOIR: Dead On Arrival
description: Noir/Horror themed story rich interactive adventure indie game with party-based RPG elements. As you investigate various mysterious cases, you will learn more about the secrets of this dystopian world and maybe discover why most of mankind has turned into zombies. Each of your choices really matters

name: Cruft
description: Cruft is a 2D, pixel-art crafting game. It has a minimalist aesthetic and boasts tons of crafting recipes. While moment-to-moment play is open-ended, it features a prestige system that grants bonuses on future playthroughs.

name: Gas Station Manager
description: An ultimate 1-4 player Co-op Simulation game where you build and manage your gas station completely from scratch. Team up with your friends, provide exceptional service and grow your business! Collaboration (and some chaos!) is the key to success—fuel up, have your fun and rise to the top!

name: Plague of Athens VR
description: Plague of Athens tells the story of Nikos of Athens, a physician during history’s first recorded pandemic, 429 BCE, who struggles to treat the multitude who fall ill during this world-upending ordeal.

name: Crestfall
description: Turn based strategy game of capture the flag. All pieces are hidden at the start

name: Dekiai Heart Candy Kun.
description: This is the otome game that you can experience living together with a slightly twisted boyfriend.

name: That New Diner
description: That New Diner is a short murdersim visual novel for Android, Linux, Mac and Windows.

name: Customized Girlfriend
description: A stroke of luck presents you with a chance to receive a prototype mechanical maiden for testing, propelling you into a romantic adventure. As crises loom, will you protect the idol of a girl group or the mechanical maiden? Who will become your guiding light?

name: Black Mesa: Military
description: Experience the consequences of the resonance cascade scenario once again, and play as one of Hazardous Environments Combat Unit marines, Steven Mills. You are not a survivor, you are sent on a mission. Secure Black Mesa Research Facility with the rest of your squad and eliminate any hostile forces. This mod is not a recreation of any existing mods. It's my own creation and all maps and plot are being developed by me. You will experience Black Mesa disaster from a perspective of the villains and even see Gordon Freeman in person.

name: World Pole Stone Dusk: Diadem of the Pole
description:
The World Pole shattered, and with its destruction emerged a rusted fog that settled fast throughout the world.

Traverse through the desolate Stone Dusk to retrieve the sacred artifact destined for your grasp.

name: Miss Inconspicuous Maid Girl Cleaning Co.
description: Welcome to Miss Inconspicuous Maid Cleaning Co.! Follow (or decide) the story of Ellie, a completely normal girl in a completely normal society, in this completely normal job!

name: Null Path
description: Your skill, patience, and ingenuity will be tested in this homage to precision platformers and metroidvanias! Traverse various biomes, from caves to volcanic wastelands and mysterious towers. Each environment with it's own deadly traps, puzzles, and challenges designed to push you to your limits.

name: Pardus
description:
Pardus is a free award-winning, real-time graphical game set in a futuristic universe that can be played right from your browser!
Test your wits against thousands of others in this vast, persistent universe as you struggle to survive! Trading, pirating, smuggling, military ranking - how you play is totally up to you in this open-ended game set in space.
Playable with all common web browsers - No downloads or plug-ins required!

name: The Maze Survivor: First Entrants
description: The Maze Survivor: First Entrants is a free online survival horror game that supports 1-4 players. You lost your memory and woke up in the center of a maze! The maze is full of monsters and traps. Find a way out of the maze through exploration, puzzle solving and cooperation!

name: League of Legends: 2025 Season One - Welcome to Noxus
description: Welcome to Noxus is the first thematic season of 2025 in League of Legends.

name: Red Planet: Survive
description:
Red Planet: Survive is a first person survival game for Microsoft Windows.

Surviving in the harsh conditions of the Red Planet will be hard, but if you are strong enough, you will succeed.

name: Koko kara Natsu no Innocence!
description:
Not so long ago, as the urban areas progressed in their development towards being an information society, there were many places in the mountainous area which kept the same olden feeling. Yoshitsugu was a visitor from 100 years in the future who came to the mountain village Akio-mura. He had been labelled as a failure in the ultra-competitive society in the future, so it was unknown how he was able to travel to the past, an opportunity open only to those with high social positions.

Yoshitsugu, a "naturally born child" in age of artificial birth, wandered about in the mountains in the dark in confusion. He followed a firefly, which led him to a young girl in a small lake. The girl Iroha took him into her home for the night. Afterwards, he was granted special permission to stay in the village and enjoy life in the village for a little while. He got to know Iroha better, along with the actual visitors from the future, sisters Arika and Yuno, as well as the village chief’s daughter, Kotobuki. It was much different than the time he lived in: he felt soothed by the slow and carefree days.

Was it luck that brought him to the past? He thought that even he would be able to accomplish something here, like maybe fall in love with a girl. Their summer love story begins here.

name: Yoru no Rojiura Annai
description:
On a winter day near christmas, guide a young girl lost through the back alleys and protect her from thugs and witches.
A visual novel with multiple endings.

name: Condor 3
description: Condor Soaring Simulator simulates the complete gliding experience on your computer. With it you can learn to fly gliders and progress up to a high level of competition skill. The core of the simulator is the state of the art physics model and advanced weather model aimed at soaring flight.

name: Forgotten Spirit
description: Forgotten spirit is a first-person hardcore action game set in a fantasy world. Become a disturbed ghost and get ready to fight your enemies, parkour and explore.

name: AliveZ
description: Fifteen years ago, a mysterious shrine suddenly appeared. It emitted an evil air and people were transformed one after another.... Yin, a group of evil people, and Yang, a group of people who has an opposite nature to Yin. The story takes place in the midst of slaughter happened in the town....

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: The Fate of Atlantis - Episode 2: Torment of Hades
description:
The Fate of Atlantis – Episode 2: Torment of Hades is the second of three downloadable content packs in The Fate of Atlantis DLC for Assassin's Creed: Odyssey.
This episode focuses on the visit to Tartaros to face Hades and reveal more of the mystery surrounding the sunken city of Atlantis.

name: Pixel Duel
description: Unlicensed mobile RPG gacha game, about collecting anime characters and assembling a team of 5 fighters to take on a multitude of game modes.

name: Assassin's Creed Odyssey: The Fate of Atlantis - Episode 1: Fields of Elysium
description:
The Fate of Atlantis – Episode 1: Fields of Elysium is the first of three downloadable content packs in The Fate of Atlantis DLC for Assassin's Creed: Odyssey.
This episode focuses on the visit to Elysium to face Persephone and reveal some of the mystery surrounding the sunken city of Atlantis.

name: Epyka
description: Epyka is an adventure, puzzle, narrative VR caper into the mysteries and blunder of a forgotten society. Reveal secrets by deciphering clues, decoding hidden messages, and revealing veiled pathways on your quest to finish what your father started and finding out what happened to the world's first civilization. The game's short length and squabble from characters doesn't diminish the fact that Epyka is incredibly charming and the gameplay is so intriguing all the way through that your only complaint might be that you want more.

name: Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 - Future Saga: Chapter 2
description: The second chapter in the FUTURE SAGA series depicts an unprecedented alteration of history! Includes new Playable Characters, new Extra Missions, Parallel Quests, Additional Moves, and Costumes!

name: Kemono Friends Festival
description:
Kemono Friends Festival is a Kemono Friends mobile game developed by Goodroid. It is the second RPG in the Kemono Friends franchise, with the first being the Nexon game, and the fourth mobile game overall.

It's a vertical slingshot gacha game similar to Monster Strike with moe-style animal characters that can be collected and trained, each of which has their own special ability.

The game ceased receiving updates or maintenance following August 2020; however, it remained available to download until July 1st, 2024. That same day, Goodroid announced that Kemono Friends Festival would end service on October 31st, 2024.

name: [Stories to Tell] Greyville Stay
description:
"Stories to Tell" is a series of psychological horror games developed by a 15-year-old boy in which each installment is based on a dream or nightmare that I, the developer, have had. This is a game you won't want to miss...

Stories to Tell is a walking simulator, with dialogues between the character and npc`s. The game is in first person and it includes things such as being able to play games in your in-game pc and more...

name: Super Star Wars Holiday Special
description:
Super Star Wars Holiday Special is a SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis homebrew game that works like an unofficial game from the cult-classic Super Star Wars series that was released originally for the Super Nintendo, but now, loosely based on the outrageous The Star Wars Holiday Special from 1978.

Super Star Wars Holiday Special was developed for the SEGA Mega Drive / Genesis with the Scorpion Engine by earok.

name: Egress Protocol
description:
Egress Protocol is a dark party indie game in which the player must ascend an infinite tower with progressingly difficult enemies.

~Part of the Vitalisis Systems Incorporated lore line~

name: Super Mario Run: Ver. 3.0.4
description: The update added a mode called Remix 10, a new set of levels to explore with World Star, an unlockable Princess Daisy and a feature to silence the background music.

name: Pual Blarp Ghoul Cop
description:
Have you ever felt trapped?
Have you ever gelt emotions?

You are PUAL and you work at the MUALL
Due to golin related reasons, you are now a GHOUAL.

Over 100 LEVELS and games on your journey into madness.

name: Mystic Rest Stop
description: Welcome to your new summer job. Arthur Brooks, a 22 year old, starts a night job at Moon Gas Station. As he settles in, he experiences strange events that unsettle him. The urban legends about the gas station seem to come to life. Dealing with customers at night is deeply unsettling.

name: Imaginytes
description: A blend of roguelite deckbuilding and tower defense. You summon and evolve creatures, cast spells, and defend against waves of nightmares in 3d fantasy battles.

name: Once Upon a Dungeon: Infinity
description: Travel through dark dungeons, defeat dangerous creatures, and collect unique loot as you play endlessly in this hardcore, traditional roguelike.

name: Galaxy Princess Zorana
description: You are the Evil Emperor's only daughter, but can you claim the throne? Raise stats, make deals, appoint advisors, and scheme your way through the Imperial Election - unless an assassin gets you first. Rule the galaxy or die trying!

name: Sangokushi Eiketsuden
description: The GBA port of "Sangokushi Eiketsuden"

name: Royal Kingdom
description:
From the creators of Royal Match comes a brand new match 3 puzzle adventure in Royal Kingdom, starring the extended Royal Family!

You’ll meet King Richard, King Robert's younger brother, as well as a charming cast of new characters, including Princess Bella and the Wizard, to embark on a journey to build legendary kingdoms! Solve match 3 puzzles to explore new lands and defeat the Dark King & his army!

name: Cats vs Cthulhu
description: Cats vs Cthulhu is a casual survivor-like where you play as a cat the Destroyer of the Great Old Ones. Arm yourself with yarns, fruits and other delicacies. Dress up in the most stylish outfit possible. Find a way to become the ultimate weapon.

name: DuckWorld Smart Adventures
description:
DuckWorld Smart Adventures is an online Dutch educational adventure game and is a digital spinoff of the Donald Duck comics world full of exciting, funny and enlightening games with Donald Duck and other familiar Duckburg characters.

With over twenty 3D mini-games, Donald Duck Weekly ensures that your child, as a true citizen of Duckburg, can play in a safe, responsible and rich game environment.

name: DuckWorld Revive
description:
DuckWorld Revive is an online world full of exciting, funny and enlightening games with Donald Duck and other familiar Duckburg characters.

With over twenty 3D mini-games, Donald Duck Weekly ensures that your child, as a true citizen of Duckburg, can play in a safe, responsible and rich game environment.

name: Robotville: Dawn of Robot AI
description:
Play Robot, Play! Embark on an extraordinary adventure in a vast, open-world playground, where a futuristic world brimming with endless possibilities awaits you and where robots reign supreme! In this massive immersive 3D open world sandbox you can explore city sky islands, lush serene nature on surrounding islands, and even a subaquatic realm. Race against the clock in thrilling super runs, find hidden collectibles, discover Easter eggs, compete in unpredictable challenges, or simply wander and marvel at the stunning scenery while you navigate through diverse ecosystems and explore this endless 3D open world sandbox.
Robotville is a 3D open world sandbox filled with wonder and excitement, where endless exploration and replayability are limitless. With teleports to all world locations, traveling throughout the game is a breeze to breathtaking nature landscapes filled with realistic plants and animals from planet Earth and other alien worlds, all brought to life with stunning realism. Immerse yourself in a vibrant universe where robots and nature coexist in perfect harmony.

name: Natsuiro Komachi: Ichiji Senka
description: You play as a key player in your school's swim club. Your two childhood friends are part of the archery club, and your sister-in-law is trying her best to swim as well as you. You and your friends are considered the best of your small town, but during this certain summer you began receiving national attention. A TV news report has made feature on one of your archery friend's recent slew of victories. Now you are becoming notorious through her celebrity as well. You all begin training like crazy, and you soon discover the hidden feelings you have with the women around you. How will everyone put up with this sudden rise to fame?

name: D.C. Re:tune: Da Capo Re:tune
description: Remake of the first Da Capo game featuring a new heroine and a new voice cast

name: Apocalypse Express
description: Conduct, upgrade and repair your train through endless waves of enemies in a post-apocalyptic setting. In this action management roguelike, the player decides to embark on a journey through the wasteland looking to fulfill the dream of seeing the remains of the outside world.

name: Minutescape
description: Dodge bullets and upgrade yourself in Minutescape, a retro-inspired incremental game that keeps unfolding. Unlock new abilities and keep upgrading yourself to survive for 5 consecutive minutes.

name: Beautiful Sakura: Fashion Club
description: A continuation of Kaito's journey.

name: Summun Aeterna
description: Summum Aeterna is a fast-paced Roguelite inspired by the Metroidvania Aeterna Noctis. Create your own worlds, challenges, difficulty and influences in each new run. Die, learn, become stronger, and achieve victory. Death is inevitable, but glory is only for the chosen.

name: Beautiful Sakura: Running Club
description:
A continuation of Kaito's journey, where he embarks on a new hobby. This visual novel delves into themes of love, friendship, and self-discovery.

Players once again step into Kaito's shoes, guiding him through the ups and downs of his new life, where every run brings him closer to understanding himself and those around him.

name: Mr. Slime in Dungeon
description: A 2D side-scrolling adventure. Run, jump, and slide as you explore dungeons, collect coins, and unlock the portal chest to advance to the next stage. Help Mr. Slime achieves his goal of becoming the richest slime in the dungeon.

name: Buca!
description: Buca is a rather simple game where you’ll be trying to put a puck into a hole. The first levels will be easy, since there will only be a single obstacles ahead of you. With time, the difficulty of the game will start growing and each level will bring with itself ever more obstacles. You also need to hit the puck on your first try, since you cannot launch it more than once on a single level. There’s a total of 100 levels in the game, so you won’t get bored easily. You can play the game on your mobile phone, so good luck!

name: The Sims 3
description:
The Sims 3 is a console game, developed by Edge of Reality and published by Electronic Arts for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3.

For the first time ever, players could upload and download content via Xbox Live and PlayStation Network, including player creations from the Exchange for free, and new items released by EA, which costed a fee. As of July 2018, the Exchange for consoles has been shut down.

Much like The Sims 2 for PSP, the game has been removed from Xbox Marketplace and PlayStation Store, meaning that the digital version is only available to download to players who have previously buy it. The same applies to the Pets variant.

name: Impetus
description: A vertically scrolling shooter developed by Inofuto for a variety of systems.

name: Stellar Docks
description: Stellar puzzles, logic without limits!

name: Street Food Restaurant Owner
description:
You don't need Mishelin Star to create the best restaurant in the world. Who says street food can't be delicious?

Start a real street food restaurant in your city and make it a legend. It's all for your beloved customers and let everyone visit you and find something tasty. Make this place trendy and watch your business grow!

Expand and upgrade your restaurant. Every guest will feel the fusion of the simple street food and amazing taste. Be a perfectionist and create something unique even in such a trivial place.

Manage the restaurant - add tables and new thematic spaces. Open new zones and add new dishes. Experiment with the menus and the ingredients. It's all up to you!

Let everyone taste and fall in love with your delicious street food!

name: Sokorobot
description: In this puzzle game, a robot need to clear paths to unlock new levels!

name: Unaccessible
description: Unaccessible is a third-person wheelchair platformer about struggling to get a health insurance claim approved on a mysterious island without accessibility ramps. Tackle stairs, climb obstacles and hop your way through the pain of the claims approval process.

name: Circle of Nature
description: Sin descripción

name: Ball Cannon
description: Sin descripción

name: Discopup
description: In DISCOPUP, you're a seal eager to party, making your way to the most famous nightclub in the city: DiscoPup. However, tonight, the bouncer is only letting dogs in. How will you make it past him?

name: Slender: Reborn
description: Rediscover terror in this reimagined classic survival horror. Collect eight pages and evade the relentless Slenderman in a hauntingly realistic world rebuilt with updated graphics, adaptive AI, and immersive sound design. Prepare for unpredictable scares and a chilling atmosphere that redefines fear

name: Immortal Desires: Book 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Immortal Desires: Paths Not Taken
description: Sin descripción

name: Our Summer Crush
description: Sin descripción

name: The Spy I Married
description: Sin descripción

name: MechAnimals
description: Gear up for mayhem: From the creative minds behind Kung Fu Panda and The Mario Movie, MechAnimals combines Roguelite progression and Beat 'Em Up action featuring cute tiny animal MECH PILOTS!

name: Palpus X: Annihilation
description: An isometric brutal horde shooter with light RPG elements. Kill tons of aliens, find over a dozen weapons, skill up your character & unveil the secrets of an abandoned research lab!

name: Sushi Monster
description: A math game that involves solving math problems in order to feed sushi to various monsters.

name: Itacante: La Cité des robots
description: In this adventure and puzzle game made for children, players need to save the citizens of Itacante and fight against the tyrant Vulcor. Helped by their companions, they must construct and use robots to solve various puzzle boards, while being introduced to multiple scientific concepts.

name: Whack Your Neighbor
description: Whack Your Neighbor is a game in the "Whack Your" series and the first by WhackIt. In this one, you have to find 32 ways (27 ways in old version) to kill your neighbor. This game introduces combo kills, which would become a staple in WhackIt's next "Whack Your" games after this.

name: Kota's New Journey
description: An elven sorceress decides to visit her old friend, but gets caught up in a series of exciting (and slightly lewd) adventures, where she finds new friends, rare spells... and loses her swimsuit.

name: ColdWire
description: ColdWire is a limit-removing mapset that aims to combine modern visuals with classically inspired gameplay. Boasting a bespoke custom palette and a tailor-made texture set, the maps in ColdWire aim to create a strong and inviting atmosphere while keeping the player on their toes with IWAD-esque but nonetheless thrilling combat. The player is going to traverse through roughly an episode's worth of techbases and urban environments in search for answers to a traffic accident of historical magnitude.

name: Precept
description: Precept is a first-person psychedelic action horror game with a heavy focus on exploration. Players take control of a night guard whose purpose is to finish his daily task. The player must find way to escape and survive from mysterious company's environment and entities.

name: Wartorn
description:
Stray Kite Studios, an indie team composed of developers from games including Age of Empires, Borderlands, and BioShock, are proud to announce their first original title, the gorgeous real-time tactics roguelite Wartorn.

Players follow two elven sisters as they journey to reunite their family. Along the way, they confront moral dilemmas and battle external and internal threats, all while utilizing elemental and physics-based systems in their desperate quest for survival. Wartorn is coming to Early Access on Steam and Epic Game Store in Spring 2025.

name: Jigty Jigsaw Puzzles
description: Solve your favorite jigsaw puzzles on the go! Jigty Jigsaw Puzzles provides an unbeatable puzzle solving experience for puzzle lovers of all ages.

name: Nevermore 3
description: A cute flash game made and painted by Adam Westerman in which we incarnate Olek, an intrepid little hero, as he ventures deeper into the beautiful, wonderful world of Nevermore. He's looking for treasure don't you know - not just any kind - but the sort of treasure that will save his village!

name: Mint's Hints 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Paranormal Night Shift
description: Paranormal Night Shift is an observation and spot the anomaly game set in a haunted house in the 1980s.

name: Renegade Racing
description:
The hit online game with OVER 180 MILLION PLAYS has made its way to mobile, bigger and crazier than ever before -- and now with multiplayer!

Renegade Racing is an adrenaline-filled, wacky multiplayer racing game. Perform epic stunts to gain turbo and race your way to victory!

Gravity-bending worlds, crazy unlockable cars, awesome power-ups and a whole lot of action awaits.

Compete in 1v5 multiplayer races and climb your way up the arena tiers. Each new tier you unlock will give you access to new levels: from the peaceful Docks, to the trap-filled caves of the Ice Caverns, to the fiery Devil's Island and to more new worlds coming soon!

Unlock and upgrade over 10 crazy cars, including a sleek police car, a Not Doppler bus, a tank, and a monster truck hearse (don't ask...)

Want to show off? Complete missions and upgrade your vehicle to unlock 16 different power-ups and a range of vehicle skins.

Don't forget, this isn’t just a game about driving. Performing stunts is key to your success! Every stunt you perform improves your turbo, allowing you to speed past other players to victory!

Ready for some crazy multiplayer racing action? Download Renegade Racing now!

name: Trapped: Family Vacation
description: Spot the differences, but each room has a survival rule.

name: Love, Internet, and Murder Magic
description: Love, Internet, and Murder Magic is a Roguelike game. You will role-play an agent of a streamer who died because of a murder. You are trying to "bring her back" through AI technology on the Internet, making her the unique creation of the Internet.

name: Palace of a Thousand Curses
description:
Palace of a Thousand Curses is a 2.5D narrative swashbuckling adventure set in an Andalusian fairy tale.

You play as a desperate beggar that has been trapped in an old storybook, where you will duel strange creatures, avoid deadly traps, and confront that most unexpected of enemies: the Spanish Inquisition.

name: Tanks 3D
description: Tanks 3D

name: Dot
description: Do something to the pixel and trigger something to happen in the game.

name: Card Coder
description: Card Coder is a card-building roguelike: A novel mix of tactical card battles, inventory management and roguelike deckbuilding, where YOU create custom cards during play. Loot, shop & collect modular ability components to make truly unique cards out of 10 billion possibilities.

name: Screen Cat
description: Meet your new furry friend — Screen Cat! This cute kitty will settle right on your desktop, adding coziness and joy to your day.

name: Tower Dominion
description: In this roguelike tower defense, repel waves of enemies by shaping the paths, customizing your defense and adapting your strategy to crush the invading swarms. No two playthroughs are the same and each strategic decision in this treacherous world could lead to survival or utter defeat.

name: Öooo
description: A Bomb Caterpillar's Big Adventure! "Öooo" is a charming yet mysterious exploration puzzle platformer where you discover creative ways to use bombs!

name: Ticky's Tower of Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Forest Reigns
description: Forest Reigns is an emergent FPS set in post-apocalyptic Paris overrun by an evolving forest and its deadly creatures. Adapt to use the ever-changing environment in your favor. Modify your guns, bond with factions and explore the world freely. Your choices will shape the story.

name: 2K Shells
description: A Kaizo dedicated to everyone who supported me on my journey so far, have fun was made with lots of love and affection for this incredible community.

name: Platoon Commander
description: Platoon Commander is a Real-Time Strategy game focused on the German advance toward Moscow in the fall and winter of 1941. It combines real-time tactical battles with a turn-based campaign map.

name: People Jumping Tower
description: "People Jumping Tower" is a casual-indie game that tests the player's athletic abilities and challenges them to beat their own records.

name: Battle Academy
description: The Xbox 360 version of BBC Battlefield Academy includes the main game and all released six add-ons.

name: You Have A Delivery
description: You Have A Delivery is a stylized, fast-paced FPS action game, inspired by action-comedy films. Take down the mafia in one night: rip apart your enemies, unlock guns and perks, and deliver unstoppable chaos. You're the only one who can pull it off. Can you deliver it?

name: Dragon Ball Z Life
